DIV1.P: EXTRACTS FROM THE ACCOUNT ROLLS OF THE ABBEY OF DURHAM, FROM THE ORIGINAL MSS.
Published for the Society BY ANDREWS & Co., DURHAM; WHITTAKER & Co., 2. WHITE HART STREET, PATERNOSTER SQUARE; BERNARD QUARITCH, 15, PICCADILLY; BLACKWOOD & SONS, EDINBURGH.

DIV2.HEAD: 1307-8.—Compotus d'ni Joh'is de Seton, Celerarii, a die Sci. Jacobi Apostoli anno, etc., cococo septimo, usque ad diem Dominicam proximam ante festum Sci. Ambrosii anno, etc., cococo octavo.
DIV2.P: Idem respondet de xxvs. ijd. ob. de Arr. compoti precedentis. Et de xxjli. xviijs. jd. de R. Et de cccli. iiijs. receptis de Bursario per j talliam. Et de lxxjli. iiijs. receptis de eodem per aliam talliam. Et de xxixli. xijs. r. de eisdem per tall. aliam. Et de xvjli. viijs. xd. r. de J. de Hernby. Et de cs. r. de R. de On (?) Et de xxixli. xvijs. ijd. receptis de maneriis Prioris de le Mart. Marts, i.e., Martinmas cattle, which were killed and salted for the winter. The word was "still in use in Newcastle" in 1837. "The Priory of Finchale" (Surtees Soc.), Glossary. Et de lijli. xvjs. iiijd. ob. r. de diversis creditoribus. Et de lx(li.) xviijs. ijd. r. de procuratore de Norham pro xxiij salmonibus.
Summa tocius recepte, cccc.xlijli. iijs. xd.

Expens.
Prima ebdom. vjli. xvijd.
Secunda ebdom. ciijs. jd.
Tercia ebdom. iiijorli. xiijs. vjd. qa
Quarta ebdom. iiijli. xixs. iijd. qa
Summa primi mensis. xxli. xvijs. iijd. ob.
The remaining weeks and months continue in the same form, the amounts being:—
Summa Expens. novem mensium et unius ebdo∣made, 179li. 19s. 4¾d.

Lardar.—In 228 Martis emptis per diversa loca, 105li. 17¾d., non deductis coriis, sepe, vel exitibus. In 228 Martis, deductis cor. sepe et exitib., 71li. 10s. 9¾d. In 60 carcos. boum empt. in villa apud Herterpol, 15li. In 232 multon. empt. non deductis pellibus vel exit., 10li. 17¼d. In solucione facta deduct. pellib. et exit., 100s. 11¾d. In 77 porcis cum sex porcellis, 14li. 7s. 1d.
Summa tocius Lardarie in carnibus, deductis deducendis, 105li. 18s. 10½d.
Allec. et dogdr.—In 1748 dogdr. per majus centum empt., 35li. 3s. 7d. In 20 last. MM allec., 51li. 12¾d. In 23 salmonibus empt. apud Norham, 78s. 2d.
Summa toc. Lard. in piscibus, 90li. 2s. 9¾d.

In 105 petr. Casei, 19 petr. Boutiri, quatuor petr. de sepo empt., 4li. 12s. 4d. In amigdalis, croco, Rys, pipere, galanga, ficubus, resinis, et aliis minutis, cum oleo, sepis, et alleis emptis, 8li. 8s. 10½d.
In feno et foragio empto cum stipend. servientium, 6li. 18d.
Summa toc. Lard. in carnibus, piscibus, et aliis minutis, deductis deducendis, 215li. 4s. 4¾d.

Summa omn. exp. infra Coquinam, 395li. 3s. 9½d. Celerarius futurus respondebit. De qua summa extrahend. nunc in equis, pullis, carcos. boum, multonum, et aliis minutis ut patet in quadam indentura, 79li. 18½d. de quibus futurus Celerarius respondebit.

Item extrahenda sunt de carnibus, piscibus, et allec. furtive asportatis per diversa loca, una cum exhennio misso d'no Archiepiscopo Ebor., et tribus bobus cum porcis mortuis in morina, 11li. 15s. 1¾d.
Summa exstraccionis, 90li. 16s. 8¼d.

Et sic est summa omn. exp. infra Coquinam de claro, 304li. 7s. 1¼d. Que dividuntur per menses, videlicet, quolibet mense, 32li. 18s. et 2d. ultra in universo. Et sic qualibet ebdomada 8li. 4s. 6d. et 2¼d. ultra in universo.
In cera empta et ferro, 42s. 10d. Item in variis Expens. extra Coquinam. expensis factis extra Coquinam, 10li. 19s. 9¾d. Item in variis solucionibus factis pro variis debitis, 33li. 9s. 6d.
Summa omn. Exp. extra Coquinam, 46li. 12s. 1¾d.
Summa omn. Exp. infra et extra, 441li. 15s. 11¼d.
Et sic excedunt recepte expensas in 7s. 10¾d., Qui condonantur super compotum.

Of the same year is a long roll consisting of four skins, on which are written the expenses of the above 37 weeks in full. The top of this roll is decayed and illegible. Extracts here follow as specimens.
(3rd week, beginning on Saturday, Aug. 12, 1307).

Sabbato in liberacionibus, Cf. Roll of 1340. 17s. 10¼d. In 234 makerell, 12 congr. in villa, D di. merlinges apud Hert., 15s. 11d. Die Dominica, In j carcos. bovis, 2 vitulis et 1 porco emp. in villa, 12s. 3d. Die Martis, In j carcos. empt. in villa, 5s. 8d. Die Mercurii, In c de makerell, 22 pisc. sals. cccc di. merling. et sandelis, 12s. 8d. Die Jovis, In iiijxx pult. et lacte, 10s. 8d. Die Veneris, In 34 pisc. sals. de Sund. et Hert. c makerell apud Hauth. et pisc. aque dulcis de villa, 8s. 7½d. In ovis, 9s. 10½d. Summa, 4li. 13s. 6¼d.
(4th week, beginning Sat., Aug. 19).

Sabbato in lib., 18s. 4¾d. In butir, 3d. In 8 salmon., et 1 qar. xx pisc. sals., et ccc sp'linges de villa, 18s. 8½d. In 1 summa pisc. emp. apud Hert' eodem die, 3s. Die Dominica; In carne porc. empt. in villa, 3s. Die Martis; In 1 carcos. bou', carne porc. et vitulin. de villa, 9s. 6d. In MDccc Merling' empt. apud Hert', 12s. 8d. Die Mercurii; In 13 pisc. sals. empt. in villa, 4s. 5d. In 54 pulcin', 3 capon', et lacte, 9s. 4½d. Die Veneris; In 200 makerell, 300 sp'ling', et 400 merling' de villa, 9s. 2d. In ovis, 12s. 9½d.
Summa, 4li. 19s. 3¼d.
Summa primi mensis, 20li. 17s. 3½d.

In 9 porcellis. In 1 summa de plaises emp. in villa, 5s. 2d. In 48 Aucis. In albo pisce, plaices, et sp'linges de villa, 3s. 4d. Die Dominica, In 3 summis de Sund., 11s. 11d. In anguill. empt. apud Sund., 3s. In 2 summis pisc. apud Hauth. et aliis pisc. apud Hert., 10s. 5d. In 1 summa de Neubigg', 5s. In 2 summis pisc. de Neubigg',
8s. 6d. In 1 porco, 1 vitulo, et dimid. exit. et sepo, 4s. 10d. In 100 Haddoks de Sund., 4s. 7d. 4 porcell., volatil., et lacte, 15s. 5½d. In muscles empt. in villa. In margine. Memorandum de vacacione Prioratus, que incipiebat— A word not made out. Anno, etc., ccco septimo.
Memorandum quod Terrario allocantur liberaciones omnibus maneriis Prioris, exceptis duobus, per duas ebdomadas, videlicet Mukl. et Beurep.
In prebenda, 2s. In 1 summa pisc. de Schelis, 6s. 9d. Week before Shrove Tuesday, In ovis, 14s. 10d.; week following, 5s. 5d. But they had recently been up to 12s. and down to 2s. 8d.
Prima ebdomada quadragesime (Mar. 2-8, 1308).

Sabbato in liberacione, 17s. 10½d. In 2 salmon. de villa, 5s. 6d. In plaices et sp'linges ibidem eodem die, 4s. 4d. Die Dominica, In vxxxiij codlinges de Schelis, 9s. 6d. In 3 summis de Hauth., 1l. 8s. Die Lune, In 1 turbote de villa, 4s. 2d. Die Mart., In 2 summis de Hauth., 14s. In 2 summis de Sund. eodem die, 11s. 7d. In albo pisce de villa eod. die, 3s. Die Mercur., In 1 summa de Sund. et al. pisc. de villa, 8s. 9d. Die Veneris, In 9 pisc. de villa, 6s. In 400 sp'linge' et plaices de villa eod. die, 5s. 6d. In muscles emp. per ebdomadam, 5s. 4d.
Summa, 6li. 3s. 6½d.

The above is the first week in which no flesh-meat or fowl appears. In the previous week all is fish except 1 porco, 1 vitulo, 10 porcellis, et 1 gallina. We find nothing but fish in the three remaining weeks; in week 36, "In 1 libra de sucore, 9d."
The total length of this roll is about 8 ft. 9 in., but the third and fourth skins have never been sewn on. On the back are lists of sums due to a number of persons, and of wages.
(Membr. 4 in dorso) Soluciones facte diversis creditoribus pro Arrerag' primi anni.

To several persons mentioned only by name; also, Magistro de communia, 68s. 6d.; Stephano, 12d.; cuidam pauperi pro butiro, 2s.; diversis servientibus pro stipendiis suis, 8s.; cuidam mulieri portanti aquam, 3s. 6d.; Stephano, 8½d.; Pultar', 7s. 8d.; Emptori ovorum, 21s. 2½d.; Liberac', 17s. 8d.; cuidam mulieri de Hauthorn, 13d. (etc.).
Summa, 33li. 9s. 6d.
In solucione facta diversis creditoribus pro arr. comp. anni precedentis, 33li. 9s. 6d.

In 1 equo emp. de Hugone de Corbr., 4li. 11s.; In duobus pullan' empt. apud le Brum, 4li. 14s.; In prebend. et in expens. eorundem equorum, 15s. 1½d.; In circulis doliorum, 5s. 11d.; In lichino, 4s. 6½d.; In una ulna de canabo et cord. ad lardar., 11d.; In ferro et assere, 19¾d.; In duabus patellis emendandis, 7d.; In cribris ad pistrinum reparandis, 4d.; In ovis pannariis (?) ad opus piscatorum, 15d.; In cellis eorundem piscatorum reparandis, 9½d.; In factura stabuli pariet' de le Westhorchard 11½d.; In falcacione prati de Dunuel, 15d.; In faccione card. (?) occident. per vices, 14d.; In 5 acr. prati et di. cum exp. empt. de J. Rand., 40s.; In foragio empt. pro bobus pascendis, 16s. 4d.; In tribus capistris et tribus sursinglis, 16d.; In 33 lib. cere, 19s. 3d.
Summa, 13li. 2s. 7¾d.

Stipendia serviencium. Willelmo de Hoton, 13s. 4d.; Duobus piscatoribus pro termino, 5s.; Servient. de le Westhorchard pro 1 anno, 5s.; Waltero de Neubig', 13s. 4d.; Hugoni filio Acelini, 13s. 4d.; Tornatori pro mercede unius termini, 2s. 6d.; Marescallo, do., 3s. 6d.; Hugoni Pulter, do., 2s. 6d.; Emptori de Hathor' pro uno anno, 6s. 8d.
Summa de feno et foragio cum stipendiis, 6li. 18d.
On the back of Membr. 1 is a similar account of debts, but including—
Capellano de Pydyngdon, 3s.; cuidam Janitori de Fynchall, 10s.; Elemos. pro Wylubeuys, 10s.

Of this same year, if correctly dated 1307 in a modern hand, is a small roll headed "Empcio Lardar.," purchases of cattle, sheep, pigs, dogdrave, herrings, cheese, butter, fat, saffron (vjli. emp. apud Scm. Botulphum, At Boston Fair. See Bursars' Rolls. 18s.), pepper, almonds (emp. apud Scm. Botulphum) 58s., rice, wax; In aucis ad obolum lib. cursori, 5s.; oil (emp. ap. Leyc.). In sepis et all. empt., 9s. 1½d.; In ij petr. ferr. de rem., 9d.; In xij cor' sals. de Rem. comp. In vijli. cymini emp. in villa, 8½d.
Also a still smaller roll, indented at the top:

P.HI: Status Celerar' dimissus per Johannem de Seton.

DIV2.P:
De uno palefrido, 4li. 11s.; duabus pullanis, 4li. 13s. 5d.; 78 carcos. boum, 18li. 12s.; 9 carcos. multon,
10s. 6d.; 23 porcis, 6li. 12s. 8d.; 24 baconibus, 60s.; 256 dogdr., 6li. 14s.; 85 piscibus salsis, 45s.; 8 last. allec., 20li. 6li.; 12 petr. sagiminis, 12s.; 9 lagenis olei, 22s.; 52li. de Amigdal., 6s. 3d.; 35li. de Rys, 3s. 6d.; 16 petr. casei, 8s.; 8 petr. butir, 8s.; 20li. de cera, 11s. 8d.; 9 bobus pastis, 117s.; 1 qar. dimid. pisarum pro prebenda Equorum, 5s.; 1 Ras. pisarum pro potag. Conventus, 18½d.; 1 qar. Avene, 2s.; ferro, 40s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1309-10.—Comp. fr. Joh. de Wytteby, Sabb. in crast. Tr. S. Bened. 1309 ad eundem diem 1310.
DIV2.P: Recept. 816li. 7s. 6½d.
Summa 451li. 13s. 9d.
xiijcim Mens.
rem. 13 Multon. qui non deducuntur quia 8 sine pell. lib. et 1 furabatur.
Summa, in carnibus, 161li. 2s. 5d.
De lx de Scrafisse viz. in qualibet centeno vjxx, et D de Stocfisse, viz. in quolibet centeno vjxx; In 9 duoden. murenorum. In 1 Barello de Sturgun, 1 barello olei olive.
Summa, in pisc. etc., 146li. o¾d.
Summa in carn. et pisc., 307li. 2s. 5¾d.

In 760 libr. amigdal., 204li. de Rys, 24½li. croci, 31½li. piperis, 4li. zinziberis, 1li. de Galanga, di. li. de cubibis, 2½li. cynamomy, 1li. de Brasill, 3li. de sucere, 2 couple et di. de ficubus, 44 lb. de cera, 30 ulnis de canabo, farina pro potagio, pis. sepis, et all., aucis ad obolum, discis et platell., patell., 1 urceolo, feno et foragio, cum 1 equo pro piscator. empt., cum stipendiis servientium, 37li. 8s. 9¼d.
Summa omn. exp. infra coquinam, 796li. 8s. 9¼d.

The account of almost daily expenses for 52 weeks, with the Empcio Lardar., is on six skins that have been pasted together, but have become separated by the decay of the paste. On the back of Membr. 1 is the following account:—

P.HI: Comp. J. de Wytteby Celerarii, a die Sabbati in crastino Translacionis Sci. Benedicti anno, etc., ccco nono, usque ad eundem, anno revoluto.

DIV2.P:
In reparacione stagni per duas ebd., 34s. 9d. In mercede 1 sarratoris, 16s. 6d. Willelmo Gentilman et
filio suo per 15 dies pro reparacione liminar. bracine, 6s. 8d. . . . emp. pro liminar. bracine et coquine et fenestr. scaccarii, 3s. 4d. (About six entries decayed away). In 1 corda ad . . . Prioris, 12d. In lichino pro candel. de cera et sepo, 2s. 1½d. In reparacione murorum gardini occidentalis, 7s. 3d. In muliere portant. sabulum et lapides per vices, 16s. 11d. In alnis (?) ad molend., 3s. 6d. In 2 paribus molarum, 26s. 8d. In reparacione sellarum, frenorum, et capistr., 6s. 2d. In 2 ceris emp., 6d. In exp. W. Lardiner versus Corbrig', 6d. In euntibus apud Norham pro negocio domus per vices, 3s. 6d. In exp. longe carecte apud Corbrig pro carn. cariand., 3s. Item carectario ejusdem in potu, 9d. In 6½ petr. ferri de Rem., 2s. 6d. In 16 petr. ferri emp. apud Castrum, 5s. In 9li. Stanni de Rem., 22½d. In 4li. Stanni emp. in villa, 12d. In 3 Schaffes aceris Sheaves or fagots of steel. de Rem., 5d. In 3li. picis emp., 4d. In 1 securi emp. pro le Wodyard, 11d. In 1 cribro emp. pro pistrina, 2d. In 2 pannis de pilo pro cribris in pistrina, 2d. In colleccione decimarum, falcacione Dunwelmedu et gard. occidental., 9s. 4¾d. In exp. Celer. versus Novum Monasterium pro negocio domus, 6s. 4d. In exp. ejusdem versus Ebor. pro negocio domus, 13s. 7d. In do. versus Norham et redeundo, 13s. In do. circa piscaciones fac. contra festum Sci. Cuthberti, 10s. In uno equo empto de W. Brome, 106s. 8d.; Item in alio equo empt., 29s. 8d. In ollis ligneis et luteis, 2s. 4d. In 10 qar calcis de Rem., 5s. 3d. In 6 qar empt., 3s. In factura Cuvarum cum circulis emptis, 17s. 10d. In 9li. eris de rem., 18d. In 3 schaffes aceris emp., 12d.
Summa, 19li. 3s. 1¾d.
Membr. 1, recto.

Accounts for five weeks, similar to the weekly accounts given above, but amounting to considerably more. First month, 43li. 3s. 4d. The Sabbatum at the beginning of each week is described according to its place in the Calendar, thus, "Sabbato in crastino Transl. Sci. Benedicti"; "Sabbato in vig. be. Margar."; etc. And there are marginal notes, as (4th week) "Festum Sancti Oswaldi principale," (5th week) "Festum Assumpc. principale, et Eps. Sci. Andr. interfuit."
Membr. 2. Accounts for eleven and a half weeks.

In 9 cungr., 8 turbotes, 1 porpas, 100 anguill. et 300 sperlinges, 18s. 9d. Ebdomada Sci. Cuthb. in Septembri
(extra provisions). In 11th week, 60 columbell. 17th week, In 11 summis pisc. emp. ad varios portus et in villa, 55s. 8d.
Membr. 3. 13 weeks and 2 portions.

19th week, In sprottis, etc. 20th, In sprot, etc. 21st, Dominica prima adventus. 24th, Ebdomada Natalis D'ni (no very special provision). 25th, Circumc. D'ni. 26th, Epiph. D'ni. 30th, beginning ultimo die Januar. quo die eclips. solis; in margin, Eclipsis solis contigit isto die. Mr. Percy J. Heawood has ascertained that the eclipse of January 31st, A.D. 1310, was an annular one. According to his calculation, the time of maximum obscuration at Durham was 1 h. 7 m. p.m., and the moon would then have covered nearly seven-eighths of the sun's disc, leaving a small crescent visible on the upper and western side of the dark face of the moon. The eclipse would thus present a striking, though not annular, appearance at Durham, and a considerable amount of darkness would be caused.
Membr. 4. 11 weeks and 1 portion.

32nd, Ebdomada prima Septuag., "Sports" continue to be mentioned frequently. 35th, prima ebdomada quadrag., All fish. 36th, Ebdomada Sancti Cuthberti in Marcio, Still all fish, including In Muscles et Wilkes emp., 4s. 40th, Dominica in Ramis Palmarum. Festum Parasceve. 41st, Dominica Pasch., Flesh and fowl reappear, including "In 26 capriolis." In the following week there are 31 "capriol."
Membr. 5. 10 weeks.
43rd, "Capriol." continue in this and two following weeks. 46th, Ebd. rogac. et Ascens. D'ni. 47th, In 11 salmon., 15 salmunculis, 19s. 48th, Ebd. Pentec. 9 salmon., 9 salmunculis, 8 capriol., etc.
Summa 13cim mensium, 451li. 13s. 9d.

Empcio Lardar. A similar account to that of 1307-8, but longer. 761 lb. of almonds, 204 of rice, 24½ of saffron, 3li. de succre marrokes de rem., 2s. 6d.; j copula de ficubus et racemis de rem., 11s.; j copula et j fraell empt., 18s. In 3 patellis magnis de cupro empt., 4li.

Stipendia. In una roba emp. pro Willelmo Lardener, 24s. 8d. Andr. de Bruncester pro salario suo, 20s. Johanni de Schelis, 16s. Waltero de Neubigg', 16s. Emptori de Hawethorne, 10s. Turnatori, 5s. Marescallo Celer., 7s. Servienti gardini occidentalis, 5s. Duobus piscatoribus, 10s.
Summa, 113s. 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: Mich. 1311-12. Comp. fratr. Rob. de Byrteleye.
DIV2.P: Rec. (incl. 4s. de Watlingorchard and 13s. de redd. de Sundirland), 635li. 2s. 4d.
Summa tresdecim mens., 334li. 10s. 0½d.
Amount for each week stated, as before.
in carne, 173li. 21½d.
in piscibus et aliis exp., 116li. 4s. 10½d.
tocius Lard., 289li. 5s. 8d.
omn. exp. infra Coquinam, 623li. 16s. 1½d.
Among the kitchen expenses occurs "et Robis servient. et Wylibewis."

With this Compotus roll are (1) three small rolls indented on the top, one headed Debita Celerarii, another Exoneracio Celerarii, and a third Exoneracio de rebus . . . infra Coquinam, (2) a small fragment relating to kitchen expenses, and (3) a long roll of six skins for a whole year, beginning at Michaelmas, 1311. This is very like those of former years, but mentions "lopisters," etc., thus, (7th month) In sperling', creuis, lopisters et pisc. aque dulcis, 5s. 4d. In 3 duod. lampad. et vj peces de sturgun, 39s. 10d. In Easter-week, In ostr. et pisc. aq. dulc., 4s. 10d. 8th month, 1st week, Adventus d'ni Regis et ejus mora per iij dies ibidem. In salmon, cokles, et pisc. aq. dulc., 16s. 4d. In 4 ancer Ros' 19 gall., 6s. 6d. 2nd week, mora regis apud Novum Castrum et adventus Regine. In coklis, 11d. 3rd week, mora regis et regine apud novum castrum. In 4 gallis et pull. colump∣barum, 2s. 3½d. 4th week, curleus. 10th month, 2nd week, In salmon, playces, et sandel, 15s. 8d. (sand eels frequently occur). 12th month, 4th week, In Mmmm cccc allec'., 31s. 3½d. 13th month, 1st week, 3100 herrings; 2nd week, fm. Sci. Cuthberti, 4500 herrings, In 113 auc., 103 gall., columb., volatil. et lacte, 28s. 4d.
Summa tresdecim mens. 334li. 10s. 0½d.

Monthly account followed by Empcio Lardar., etc., as before. It includes about 5000 dogdrave and many thousands of herrings, with 236 salmon from Norham, 12½ lb. of saffron, 23 lb. of pepper, 485 lb. of almonds, 173 lb. of rice, 23 lb. of ginger, with figs, raisins, cloves, cummin, and sugar. In 8 lib. de sucore de Roche et Marrok, 7s. 8d.
On the back of Membr. 1 are expenses "extra Coquinam" much as before, including In Rynges et crebris ad pistrinam, 13d. In mulieribus portantibus aquam infra curiam pro defectu conducti, 10s.

DIV2.HEAD: Mich. 1312-13. Expens. d'ni H(ugonis) Celararii.
DIV2.P: A long roll similar to the former ones. New items are, In 22 pertr', In 1 Grue, In spald. Multon, 10d.; In crevese', In lempetis (repeatedly), Wylkes; great numbers of eggs mentioned, 4000 in the week after Easter week, when the judges sat. Troutes, salmon, macrell, 50 pluvers, 40 anatibus rec. de manerio.
Summa 13 mens., 344li. 13s. 0¼d.
Empcio Lardar. Scrafissche, etc., much as before.

Exp. extra Coquinam. In j Houce emp. pro j equo piscator., 12d.; In reparacione cujusdam Lanterne ad hostium domus commune, 10d. In repar. unius selle del Baghorse, 8d. In repar. j tribuli et j furgun ferri, 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: F. Sci. Mathei, 1313-14. Comp. fr. Will. de Hextildisham.
DIV2.P: Portion of roll containing sixteen weeks' accounts on one skin. Seems not to contain anything special. In dorso, Exp. extra Coquinam. In emend. falerum equorum, baghors, fischors, etc. Mulieri portanti aquam de Were, 7d. Diversis ministris regis pro salvacione equorum qui capti erant et redempti, et gard. occid., 5s. 1d. In mun∣dacione de le Westhous, 2s.

DIV2.HEAD: S. Math. 1314-15. Comp. ejusdem.
DIV2.P: Respondet de, etc., much as above.
Summa tocius oneracionis, 615li. 19s. 1½d.
Summa tresdecim mensium, 279li. 15s. 6¾d.
Empc. Lardar. much as before.

To this is attached a short indented slip with Exoneracio Celer', and a long roll of three skins containing the remainder of the long roll of 1313-14, beginning with the conclusion of the 17th week. In month 9, week 2, we find 4200 herrings, and In butir' cas' pro flaun' et 28 lagen. lactis, 12s. 2¾d.; week 3, Adventus regis et mora et perhendinacio post; week 4, 5200 herrings; In lopster' et sprott'. Month 10, week 1, In burbot, sprot et lopsters, 7s. 1d.; week 2, Adventus Gerard Salvayn et 4 militum cum eo et aliorum superveniencium. Month 13, week 2, Festum Sci. Cuthberti. In 31 salmon, 4 trut'.
Summa 13 mens., 279li. 15s. 7¼d.
Empcio Lardar. much as before. Some of the rice, pepper, almonds, etc., rec. de Gardrob', or, de Gardrob' Prioris. Elemos. pro Wilibeuo.

DIV2.HEAD: 1316. Comp. fr. Joh'is Lutterell.
DIV2.P: (Two skins containing 10 months).

Month 2, week 2, Ebd. Natal. D'ni. Month 4, In Muscles et Cokles (thrice). Ebdo. Sci. Cuthb. in Marcio, 11li. 10s. 2d. (about twice average; no flesh or fowl), sperlinges empt. apud Tesyam et in villa. Month 8, week 1, Prior extra villam. Month 9, week 1, Justic. in villa. Et Just. comedit cum Priore. Week 2, 10 Salmon., 11 Trutes, 260 anguill., 9s. 11d. Month 10, week 4, Adven∣tus Cardinalis.
In dorso. Exp. extra Coquinam.

In reparac. sell. et singulorum del Baghors et del Fischehors, 2s. 7d. In acere empt., 18d. In 3 Wawes plumbi emp., 11s. 3d. In 7 ulnis Canabi empt. pro Coquina, 2s. 3d. In 7 Gathes emp. pro eadem, 17d. In 2 molaribus pro molend., 10s. In 2 Horsehous', 2 capistris, 3 Teris empt., 2s. 5d. In Berme empt. pro pistrina per vices, 3s. 8d. (etc.).
Summa, 12li. 10s. 6½d.

DIV2.HEAD: Die Ven. prox. ante Fest. S. Edm. Regis 1317-18. Comp. eiusd.
DIV2.P: Summa onerac., 428li. 19s. 6¼d.
Exp. per 13 menses, 204li. 14s. 2¾d.
Emp. Lardar. 2li. de Canell. 18li. de sucore de cipre.
Summa Exp. infra coquinam et extra, 428li. 17s.
On small indented slip, Exoneracio J. Luttrell, 1318.

De 6li. 13s. 4d. de quinque Martis de grano pastis captis per R. Thurck' ministrum Regis tempore d'ni A. de Marton. Et de 30s. de 2 Martis de gra. past. capt. per Radulfum Spray de tempore R. de Byrteley. Et de 7li. de 14 Martis abductis per Scottos tempore ejusdem R. Et de 20s. de 2 Martis abductis per eosdem tempore W. de Hexilsham. Et de 75s. de 5 Martis vivis rem. apud le Westorchard. Et de 20li. 16s. de 52 carcos. boum rem. in lardario. Et de 20s. de 48 carcos. Multonum rem. ibidem. Et de 12s. de 2 porcis rem. in Molendino. Et de 54s. de 15 porcis rem. in le Wodyarde. Et de 40s. de 36 dogdr. et 140 stokfysses rem. in lardario. Et de 33s. de 500 allec. reman. ibidem. 9s. de 13 petr. Casei, 46s. de 11½ lib. Croci, 2s. 2d. de 2 lib. piperis, 10s. 5d. de 50 lib. amigdalar., 12d. de 12 libr. de Rys, 3s. 10d. de 6 libr. Zucar de Cypr., 19d. de 12 libr. Cymini, remanentibus ibidem, 31s. 2½d. de 2 equis rem. pro piscator', 7s. 10d.
de 36li. Stanni rem. ibidem, 7s. 6d. de 41 Dogdr. recip. de A. de Emptoft tempore J. de Houeden, Et de 2s. 9d. de di. libr. Croci recip. de Communiario tempore ejusdem J.
Summa, 52li. 3s. 5d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1318. Comp. J. Lutrell. A long roll for the whole year, viz., 1317-8.
DIV2.P: Month 2, week 2, Ebdomada Natalis D'ni; week 3, Ep's Carlios'; week 4, Prior extra villam. Month 3, week 1, Offic. cum suis. Month 4, week 2, Dominica in Septuagesima. Month 5, week 2, Ebdomada Sci. Cuthberti; week 4, Clerici Regis versus Berwycum perhendin. cum Priore. Month 6, week 3, Ebdomada Pasch.; caprioli begin to come in, and continue for some weeks. Month 7, week 4, Ebdom. Rogacionum. Month 8, week 2, Ebdom. Pentecost. Month 9, week 1, In 47 Trutis emp., 4s.; week 2, Prior extra villam. In 20 Congr. emp., 6s. 8d., In 4 gallin. et 16 pull. gallinarum, 2s. 9d. Month 9, week 2, Prior domi. In 78 Truttis, 300 anguill, 8 Congr. et 9 Turbot. Month 11, week 2, Ebdom. Sci. Cuthberti. Month 12, week 2, Prior extra villam cum sociis. In Gruello, sepis, et alea, 17d.
Summa 13 mens., 204li. 14s. 2¾d.
Empcio Lardar. 163 marts, 7 cows, etc.; 162 live sheep, 181 dead; 86 pigs.
Summa tocius Lardar', deductis deducendis (hides, etc., and stolen cattle), 144li. 17s. 5d.
In dorso. Exp. extra Coquinam.
In 3 lib. de Cotun et lychino, 18d. In 2 equis emp. pro piscatoribus, 31s. 2½d. In 4 ulnis de Canabo emp. pro Coquina, 11d. In factura 2 cordarum pro lardario de proprio canabo, 6d.
Summa, 7li. 5s. 7½d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1319-20. St. Edm. to St. Benedict. 8 months, 2 weeks. Comp. eiusd.
DIV2.P: Empcio Lardar. In . . ccxxviij salmon. salsis.
Exoneracion slip, similar to the last.
Weekly account. Ebdom. S. Cuthb. In 20 Anguill. emp. apud Ebor., 18s. 9d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1320. About a third of a 13 months' account, beginning just before St. Cuthb. in Sept. and ending third week after Christmas.
DIV2.P: Empc. Lard. Marts bought at Corbridge, Darlington Fair, and in town.
Another fragment, containing the fifth to the eighth month of the above.

DIV2.HEAD: 1321. Weekly accounts for about 7 months, partly decayed; on back, Exp. extra coquinam, In streig∣nours emp.
DIV2.P: A fragment of Comp. fr. J. de Barneby, much decayed and illegible.
Exoneracio fr. J. de Barneby, 1321. The stolen cattle, see 1318, are mentioned every year.

DIV2.HEAD: 1323-4. Comp. J. (Luttrell) et N. (de Allerdon or Aluerton) Feb. 18 to July 14, 21 weeks.
DIV2.P: Rec., 134li. 14s. 5½d.
Summa 5 mens. et 1 ebd., 68li. 10s. 6¼d.
Omn. exp. infra Coq. et extra, 134li. 13s. 3½d.
Exoneracio and exp. extra Coq. on small slips; among the latter, In ij Rytibus (or Rycibus?) rem. post compotum, 2s. In ij paribus de Crell' emp., 8d.

Ebdom. Sci. Cuthberti. In 13 Kelinges, 7 Rayes, et 9 turbot emp. in villa, 14s. 10d.; Kelinges infra; In May and June, 3200, 4400, 1360 herrings in successive weeks; then, 2000 white herrings bought at Hartlepool, 1900 do.; verso, In 6 gallis silvestribus nigris; Last week, in 2 summis alb. pisc. emp. apud le Schell, 5s. 4d. 2½ do. in villa, 7s. 10d.; 3 turbotes et 15 Kongyrs emp. ibidem, 3s. etc.
Summa 5 mens. et 1 ebd., 68li. 10s. 17¼d.

Empcio Lardar. (boum, multonum, porcorum, dogge∣drave, allec. (in 10 lamprays emp. apud novum Castrum pro episcopo, 15s.; in 11li. de porpays et j petra et di. de—, A word not made out. 5s. 6d.; 2 lag. olei pro lumine in capitulo, 2s.), crocus, piper, amygd., Rys, empcio specierum, (suker del Roch., do. de Cypre, 2 copul. fycuum et racem. 21li. de Dates).
Stipend. Emptori de Sundyrland, 3s. 4d. Tho. et Roberto piscatoribus, 5s., Mareschallo pro ferrura equorum, 12d.
Summa toc. Lardar., etc., 65li. 6s. 6¼d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1324-25, from July to July. Comp. fr. Mich. de Gun∣warton.
DIV2.P: Item respondet de 20li. 0¾d. rec. de Arr. d'ni Joh'is Lutterell Celerarii precedentis. Et de 169li. 15s. 0½d. rec. de denar. Hostillarii. Et de 20li. rec. de Molendino de Skaltok de terminis Sci. Martini Anni D'ni Millesimi cccmi vicesimi quarti et Pent. Anni, etc., vicesimi quinti. Et de 16li. rec. de decimis garbarum de Schaldford de fructibus Anni D'ni millesimi cccmi vicesimi quarti. Et de 29s. rec. de Bursar. per tall. Et de 39s. rec. de d'no Willelmo de Kyllingworth Burs. per unam tall. Et de 6d. rec. de Henrico Mody. Et de 53li. 16s. 7d. mutuatis de diversis creditoribus, ut patet per quandam Indenturam. De quadam Domo in veteri Burgo et le Wateling∣orcheyarde, nichil, quia in manu Celerarii.
Summa rec., 284li. 3¼d.
Summa tresdecim mensium, 171li. 3s. 3½d.
Empcio Lardar. Includes 917 dogdrave emp. per minus centum, 1 porpays et 200 Haddoks, 10li. 15s.; 5 last et 4000 Allec., 16 Salmon', 12 Lampr., 17li. 6s. 10d.
Thirteen months' weekly account.

Month 1, week 3, In j summa albi piscis, 6 kelyngs, 2 Lenges empt', 4s. 8d. Week 4, In allea et sep. empt., 3d. Month 2, week 4, In Grotis emp. pro exitibus, 3d. Month 3, Fish bought of W. Hamond weekly until month 7. Month 6, week 1, In 27 gallis nigris. Month 7, week 3, In 7 gall. silvestribus; week 4, in 6 Rayes. Month 8, week 1, In 10 gall. nigris; week 3, In 12 Rayes, 9 Sprentes de trbotes; week 4, 32 Rayes, 3 Sprentes de t'botes, 6 kelinges. Month 10, week 4, In j Gedde et 60 Lamprouns. Month 11, week 1, Synod; week 2, In 16 gall. nigris. Month 12, week 1, In 2 summis albi piscis emp. apud mare, 6s. 8d. In 36 kel. et lenges, 12 torbotes sprontes (sproutes?), 16 Lopsters, 19s. 6d. In carnibus ferinis emp., 3s. (kel. et lenges weekly); week 3, carn. ferin., 4s. Month 13, week 3, carn. fer., 2s.; week 4, do., 3s. 9d.
Summa 13 mens., 170li. 3s. 3½d.
Empc. Lardar. In 2 petr. de Grapays rem. post comp.
Exp. extra Coquinam. In repar. unius furni in Coquina, 18d. In 2 paribus de Creles emp., 6d. Mulieri∣bus colligentibus mosse pro eodem (stagno), 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1326. Comp. fr. R. de Bircteley per xj septimanas; fest. S. Ben. ad fest. S. Mich. Contains nothing of special interest. Also a little Exoneration roll.
1326-7. Comp. fr. Nich. de Allirton; Mich. ad eundem diem.
DIV2.P: 5li. Zukur de Roche, 33 de Marrokes; in . . pomis all. Cepis et Streignours emp.

DIV2.HEAD: 1326. Weekly acc. of R. de Byrteley for 11 weeks from fest. S. Benedicti.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 1, In 4 spald. Multon. et carnibus ferinis; week 2, in . . sandhell emp. ibidem (ad mare). Month 2, week 4, Fest. Sci. Cuthberti (in Sept.), In 39 porcell. et Braune emp., 22s. 7d. In 3 aucis Rosettis, etc. (11li. 5s. 8½d.; week before, 4li. 18s. 8d.; after, 4li. 22½d.). Month 3, week 3, In 11 Kypres emp., 3s. 4d.
Empc. specierum. In uno quarteroun croci, 16½d. In j quarteroun de clowes, 3s.

Exp. extr. Coq. In 20 ulnis linee tele pro Naprouns et streyngoures, 5s. 5d. In j tribulo ferreo et uno schumour pro coquina, 12d. In j tera emp. pro equis del fyshors, 2d. In falcacione et cariacione feni del West∣orcheyard, 4s. 4d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1326-7. Weekly acc. of Nich. de Alverton for 13 weeks.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 1, Sociis ludentibus apud Beurepair, 12s. Month 2, week 3, in . . x perdicibus empt. Month 4, week 1, Natal. in . . . viij maulars; week 2, xvj maulars. Month 7, week 1, F. Sci. Cuthb., 57 salmon with other fish, and 200 apples; week 4, Rayes apud Hawthorne. Month 10, week 3, Adventus Ep'i Cestr.
Emp. Specierum (etc.). 34li. Zuccoris Marrok; 31 petr. casei de Manerio de Elveth, 15s.; 21 petr. casei emp. in villa, 13s. 9d.; in 300 pomis, 2s.; in streingnours de Canabo emp., 2s.
Extra Coq. In 1 Myour de novo faciend., 8d., Camer. et librar. in 16 coriis, 29s. 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1327-8. Upper part decayed. Endorsed, Mic. (Will. ?) Chilton.
DIV2.P: Rec. Et de 6s. 8d. rec. de hominibus Regine pro animalibus depastis in le Westorchard.
Exp. 13 mens., 225li. 13s. 10¼d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1328-9. Comp. fr. Symonis de Routhbyri (St. Andr. for 10 months).
DIV2.P: Summa lib. Sociis ludentibus apud Beurepayr, 61s.
Emp. Spec. 2li. pulveris Zinzib., 21li. Zinzib., 1 pipa et 1 barell olei olive.

DIV2.HEAD: 1329-30. Comp. fr. Rob. de Middilham (Mich. for one year). Weekly account of 8 months; the rest lost.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 1, 8 porcell., 4 duoden. de perdicibus, et 40 pull. gall., 8s. 3d. Month 3, week 2, carn. porc. et braune emp., 19s. 8d. Month 8, week 1, Pasch. 21 porcell., 15 capriol., 1 cigno, 12 aucis rosettis, 12 pull. col., et braune emp., 30s. 9d.; week 2, In 9 salmonibus empt. apud Ovingham et in villa, 9s. 2d. In 9 capriolis, 9 porcellis, 1 capone, 12 Morkokes emp., 12s. 1d.; week 3, 5 salm. ap. Ovingham, 5s.; 4 aucis Rosettis, 7 murkokes; etc.
Empcio de Dogdraff (etc.). In . . 1699 Dogdraff, 44 salmonibus salsis, 92 Stokfisch, 60 Scrafisch, etc., 28li. 7s. 7d.
Empc. Specierum. 114li. Succoris de Cypir emp. (10li. de Ric'o del Bischoprik). In 1 quarteroun et 2 unceis de Saundres, 3s.
Summa tocius Lard., etc., 217li. 16s. 2½d.

Exp. extra Coquinam. Canab. pro Naprouns, Streyn∣gours, cingulis et plustulis, cultello pro Coquina, 2d.; securi pro bracina, 6d.; furgoun ferr' pro Coquina, 10d.; tribulo
ferr. pro eadem, 10d.; 1 vanga ferrata, 2 tribul. et 1 furca pro fymo, 5d.; 1 furca ferrata pro feno, 3d.; j ferro emp. pro molendino, 2s. 1½d.; j pykoys, 8d.; emend. pykoss' molend., 5d.; 1 securi facta, cum clavi, 6d.; 3 paribus corbell'; ollis luteis emp. pro Saus'; 5 gatis, 18d.; 2 scopis pro Coquina, 7d.; 1 sace, 4d.; cuidam fuganti porcos de Hert. usque Dunelm., 8d.;
(This would have been an ideal roll to copy in extenso had it been complete).

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1330. An imperfect weekly roll thus dated on wrapper. Begins with 8th month and ends with 12th.
DIV2.P: Month 8, week 4, Prior domi et Famil. Reg. In xiiij Moruc. et viijto summis di. pisc. alb. In iiij petr. Butyri et speciebus pro illis de Castro qui comederunt cum priore, playc' et volatil., 9s. 9d. Month 9, week 1, Ebd. Natalis D'ni. In vj petr. et j quartroun butyr, 7s. 11d. In 2000 ovis emp. pro ebdomada. Week 2, Prior domi cum diversis in camera. In 3 Lamprouns. 1 salmone, Crabbs et Lopsters pro priore, vijs. jd. In Saundres et aliis speciebus pro illo die, 18d. Week 3, Prior domi. Week 4, Festum Episcopi. Month 11, week 1, Prior extra, sed famuli d'ni Regis infra. Month 12, week 1, Fest. S. Cuthb. Week 2, In pane dominico et melle, 5d. Week 3, 1 pyk' et pisc. aque dulcis.
Verso. Emp. de dogdraff (etc.). In ccc skrafysch, 30s. In 38 moruc', 9s. 4d.
Emp. Spec. In 5li. de Maces, 22s. 6d. In j barell de Sturgoun empt. apud Novum Castrum, 4li. 6d.
The Roll of weekly expenses, etc., of 1333-4, being all but complete, is next given in extenso.
CELERAR'.

[Co]mpotus fratris Willelmi de Hexham, Celerarii, de omnibus receptis et expensis . . . Coquina Dunelm. a die Dominica prox. ante festum Sancti Martini in Hyeme Anno D'ni Mocccmoxxxiijo usque ad eundem diem, Anno, etc., xxxiiijo.

Idem respondet de iiijli. xiiijs. jd. receptis de variis rebus rem. post compotum d'ni Willelmi de Gysburne, Celerarii. Et de cciiijxxiiijli. iijs. viijd. receptis de d'no
Willelmo de Ch(ilton) Bursario per unam Indenturam. Et de cijli. xijs. viijd. receptis de eodem per unam aliam Indenturam. Et de xxxjli. vjs. ob. mutuatis de diversis creditoribus, ut patet per quandam Indenturam.
Summa, ccccxxijli. xvjs. vd. ob.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In M' allec. empt. per ebdomadam, vjs. ixd. In j summa albi piscis, iiijs. In vij salmonibus, playc', et sperl. emptis, iiijs. ijd. In car∣nibus porc. et vitul. empt., ixs. ob. In vij porcellis, xiiij aucis, et xvij gall., vijs. iiijd. ob. In volatil. empt. per ebdomadam, iijs. In butyro et melle empt., xd. In xlviij gallinis empt., viiijs. In Dcc ovis empt., iiijs. vijd.
Summa, ls. iijd.

Sabbato in lib., ijs. vjd. In Dcccc di. allec. empt., viijs. vijd. ob. In v summis albi piscis empt. per ebdom., xijs. vijd. In xlij piscibus salsis empt. apud Hertilpoll, vjs. iiijd. In playc' et sperling' empt., iiijs. ixd. In carnibus porcinis et vij vitul. emp., xviijs. xd. In lxxvij gall., vj caponibus, xv pull. gall., et x aucis, xvijs. vd. In volatil. empt. per ebdomadam, vijs. vjd. In caseo et pomis empt., xvijd. In Cep. et all. empt., xxd. In Dc ovis empt. per ebdomadam, vs. ijd.
Summa, iiijli. vs. ixd. ob.

Sabbato in lib., ijs. vjd. In Moccc allec' siccis empt., xjs. jd. In viijto summis alb. pisc. empt., xxiijs. viijd. In iij summis de playc' et sperl. empt. de Haumundo, xvijs. xd. In viijto carcos. vitul. et carnibus porc. emp., xiiijs. xd. In xliij gallin. iij caponibus, et viijto pull. gall., viijs. ixd. In volatil. per ebdomadam, vs. viijd. In iiijor petr. di. Butyri, ijli. Zuccuris, di. lag. mell., et c pomis, vjs. In viijto porcell. empt., iijs. In xijli. di. de Rys empt., xiiijd. ob. In xiiijli. candele et all. empt., ijs. iijd. In ciiijxx ovis empt., xviijd.
Summa, iiijli. xviijs. iijd. ob.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In xj summis alb. pisc. emp. ad mare et alibi, xxxiiijs. jd. In iiijor summis alb. p. playc' et sperl. et Lopsters, xviijs. xjd. In lij gallinis et vij porcell. emp., xijs. ijd. In volatil. et v caponibus emp. per ebdom., vs. vjd. In vj petr. casei, iij quarterouns butyri, viijto lib. candel., pomis et all., vjs. In D di. ovis empt., iiijs. vijd.
Summa, iiijli. iijs. ixd.
Summa primi mensis, xvli. xviijs. jd.

Sabbato in lib., ijs. vjd. In vij summis alb. p. empt. ad mare et in villa, xxjs. xd. In v turbotis, playc' et
sperling' emp. per ebdom., ixs. viijd. In carnibus porc. et viijto gallinis empt., ijs. xjd. In iij petr. butyri et ij petr. casei, iiijs. vijd. In D di. ovis empt., iiijs. xjd.
Summa, xlvjs. vd.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In v summis alb. p. Codling et playc' emp., xxs. ijd. In xxvj salmonibus salsis et ij summis de playc' et sperl., xixs. ijd. In j carcos. vitul. et carnibus porc. emp. in villa, iiijs. vjd. In iij caponibus, x gallinis, et volatil. pro hospitibus, iijs. xjd. ob. In j petra butyri et v libr. empt., ijs. In Dccc ovis empt. in villa, vijs.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In viijto summis alb. p. emp. per ebdom., xxvjs. ixd. In ij summis de playces, sperl. et Lopsters, xvijs. jd. In ij turbotis, et j salmone emp. in villa, vjs. ixd. In carnibus vitul. emp. in villa, iijs. ijd. In lxviij gallinis pro euxhennis cum exp., vs. iiijd. In x Natal. d'ni. anatibus et volatil. emp., ixs. ixd. In iiijor petr. casei et iiijor petr. butyri, vijs. vjd. In xij gallinis emp. in villa per G. de Iuesley, ijs. ijd.
Summa, iiijli. xijd.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In ij summis alb. p. empt. in villa, xs. jd. In v carcos. vitul. j carcos. di. et j carcos. porc., xixs. ixd. In xij caponibus, vj gallinis, xiiijor anatibus, et x porcellis, xs. vjd. In j lag. di. olei, di. lag. vini acris, c pomis, et all., iiijs. vd. In Dcccc ovis empt., vijs. vd.
Summa, liiijs. viijd.
Summa secundi mensis, xijli. xvjd. ob.

In iiijxx xij gallinis et volatil. empt., xjs. xd. In vij lib. amigdal. et all. empt., ijs. vijd. In iiijc di. ovis emp. in villa, iijs. viijd.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In vij summis alb. p. emp. ad mare et in villa, xxs. xd. ob. In j salmone, playces, et lopsters, et iij kyppres salsis, iijs. viijd. In iij carcos. vitul. carnibus porc. et mutil. empt., xvs. In xlix gallinis emp. in villa, vs. xd. In Dcccc di. ovis emp. per ebdomadam, vijs. vd.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In iij summis alb. p. emp., ixs. vijd. In vj salmonibus, j Turbot, playces, sperl. et Lopsters, xijs. ixd. ob. In iij porcis, j carcos. porc. et iiijor carcos. vitul., xvijs. iiijd. In xxvj gallinis et ij maulardes empt., iiijs. ixd. ob. In iij petr. casei empt. pro lib., xxjd. In Dcccc ovis empt., vijs. xd.

In iiijor carcos. porc. et iiijor carcos. vitul. emp., xxijs. ixd. In viijto aucis, xvij gallinis, iij porcellis et volatil., xs. iiijd. In j petra Butyri et pomis empt., ijs. ijd. In cc ovis emp. in villa, xvjd.

Sabb. in lib., ijs. vjd. In Ml allec. siccis emp. apud Novum Castrum, ixs. ixd. In v summis alb. p. emp. apud Sunderland die Pur., xvjs. vijd. In ij Salmonibus emp., Ep'us et prior domi. vjs. vjd. In playces, sperl. Lopsters, et Musculis pro famil., vs. vd. In vij carcos. vitul., ij porc., ix porcell. et carnibus porc., xxiijs. xd. In xxxij gallinis emp. in villa, iiijs. vjd. In volatil. all. ij petr. di. casei pro flaunes emp., vjs. In Mlccc di. ovis empt., viijs. vd.

Empcio Lardar. A die Dominica prox. ante festum Sci. Martini in principio hujus compoti, usque ad festum Pasch. prox. sequens.

In primis in ix martis emp. in foro ad diversa precia in prima ebdomada et secunda primi mensis, lxxiiijs. vjd. Item in j bove de Manerio de Fulwell in morina, cum pelle, per J. de Pytingdon, vs. It. in j bove de Manerio de Belasys, xvjs. In ij vaccis et j tauro rec. de Burs., xvs. In j bove sine pelle, et j vacca cum pelle, in morina, rec. de Beurepayr, viijs. It. in j vacca emp. de Willelmo Wattesone, ixs. In v bobus rec. de J. fil. Walteri servientis de Pytingdon, prec. pec., viijs., xls. In v bobus rec. de Roberto Raynald, serviente de Fery, prec. pec. ut supra, xls. In vj martis rec. de Alano serviente de Houghall, prec. ut supra, xlviijs. In xiiijor martis rec. de Manerio de Ketton, que venerunt de Billinghamschyr, prec. pec. ut supra, cxijs. It. in j vacca cum vitulo rec. de Mukl. in morina cum pelle, vjs. viijd. In xviij vaccis rec. de J. Cowhyrd, cxiijs. iiijd. In iij boviculis de illis qui venerunt de Norham, xiiijs. iijd. In j vacca missa pro exhennio per Rectorem de Cavers In Roxburghshire., ixs. In xiij vaccis rec. de procur. de Norham, cvjs. vjd. ob. qa. In ij martis emp. apud Derlington per terrarium, xxvjs. In bosco cariato apud le Westorchyard pro discis et patell. re∣parandis, xvjd. In vino et cervisia empt. in adventu mercatorum pro defectu potus de refectorio per vices, ijs. vjd. DIV2.HEAD: Port Lat. 1337-8. Comp. fr. W. de Hextildesham.
DIV2.P:
Month 2, week 1, Prior domi et festum Pent. Week 2, Prior domi et festum Trinitatis et Corporis Christi. In lacte per ebdomadam pro Charlet, exit., et sepo, 4s. 6d. Week 3, Fest. Sci. Joh. Baptiste et Prior domi, 12 paria de numbles. Week 4, Prior domi, 21 moruc. in parte salsis, Numbles. Month 3, week 1, Prior domi. Week 2, Prior apud Muklingwyke. Week 3, In 3 summis pisc. alb., 1 Luc' playc' et cc anguill., 27s. 5d. Week 4, In xj salmonibus et iiijxxxvij trutis de Ovingham per ebdomadam, 14s.; pyes pro hospit'. Month 4, week 1, Prior extra. iij quarter unius delfini recentis. Week 2, Prior extra. Month 4, week 3, In vj salmonibus de Adam de Ovingham, 4s. Month 5, week 1, Festum Sci. Cuthberti in Sept., In 2 scutis de Braune pro festo empt. a diversis. In 133 gall. 2 caponibus, 4 duoden. pull. columb. et 24 gall. silvestribus empt. a diversis per parcellas, cum eorum esca, 25s. 2d. In 1li. pulveris galange et alia li. pulveris zinziberis et 2li. piperis et dimid., et dimid. li. de saundres empt. pro dicto festo, 15s. 9d. Week 2, Prior domi, In 3 caponibus oblitis. Week 3, Prior domi. Week 4, Prior domi, 3 duod. de pluveris. Month 6, week 1, Prior extra, In j magno Luc' empt., 6d. Week 2, Prior extra. Week 3, Prior extra. Week 4, Prior extra, 16 aucis et 3 anatibus. Month 7, week 1, Prior domi et festum omnium Sanctorum; 1 anguilla grossa. Week 2, Prior domi continuo. Constabular. et alii cum eo in magna camera. Week 3, 12 anatibus. Week 4, Prior domi. Month 8, weeks 1, 2, 3, Prior domi. Week
4, Prior domi; familia Regis. In 4 petr. butyr. et speciebus pro illis de castro qui comederunt cum priore, playc', et volatil', 9s. 9d. Month 9, week 1, Ebdomada Natal. In 3 lib. fycuum empt., 3d. Week 2, Prior domi cum diversis in camera sua. Crabbs et Lopsters pro priore. In 24 gallinis et esca pro eisdem. In saundres et aliis speciebus pro illo die, 18d. Week 3, Prior domi. Week 4, In ista Septimana erat festum Episcopi.
Summa clare ebdomade, preter festum Episcopi, 68s. 7d., preter garnestur'.

Month 10. In diversis rebus emp. de Johanne Mody pro dicto festo, videlicet carnibus boum, porc., vitul. et aliis diversis rebus ab eodem pro festo predicto computatis in presencia terrarii et Bursarii ut patet per particulas, 6li. 2s. 4d. In 5xx2 aucis, 6 caponibus rec. de servientibus maner. que tall. cum Burs., 22s.; In 12 caponibus de Billingham, 16 anatibus, et 25 gall. rec. de Beulu et Bill., 9s. 10d. It. in 30 pull. gall., 32 aucis, 2 vitulis vivis, et volatil. emp. per Johannem de Hesilden pro eodem festo, 21s.; In 43 gall. emp. et rec. de Wyuestow, 7s. 2d.; In 12 auc. emp. et rec. de Pytingdon, 3s.; In variis rebus emp. de Alano de Communia pro festo in presentia Bursarii, 11s. In 5xx7 penyhennis emp. in Billinghamschyr per Bursarium et Celerarium, 8s. 11d. It. in 63 gallinis decimalibus de vicario de Bill. pro dicto festo, 10s. 6d.; It. in 2 Copul. de Maulard de Ryver empt. per Burs., 15d.; It. in 28 anatibus domesticis empt. ibidem per Burs. et Cel., 4s. 8d.; In 8to porcis emp. pro dicto festo, 48s.; In diversis rebus emp. per G. pro festo ex precepto Terrarii, 47s. 11d. Memorandum quod ad istud festum expendebantur de Lardario octo carcos. boum, prec. pec., vs. Et 20 carcos. mutil. prec. pec., 12d., et 6 carcos. porc., prec. pec., 3s. Summa, 78s., et sic est summa festi de claro, cum Lardario, 19li. 15s. 7d. Weeks 1, 2, Prior domi; 3, 4, extra. Month 11, week 1, Prior extra, set familia d'ni regis infra. Weeks 2, 3, 4, extra. Week 4, in 8to summis grossi pisc. 4or turbot' et 3 leng', 68s. 11d. Month 12, week 1. Festum Sci. Cuthberti. Sabbato in libera∣cione, 4s. 2d. In 17 summis pisc. gross. et di. emp. apud Hertilpoll et Hawthorn et le Schell pro festo Sci. Cuthberti ut patet per particulas, 6li. 16s. 5d. In 18to turbot' et xlj salmonibus, 4li. 15s. 6d. Summa, 11li. 16s. 1d. Week 2, In 7 turbot' magnis empt., 13s. 4d. In pane dominico et melle, 5d. Week 3, 1 pyk. Week 4, In v summis di. pisc. alb., v lenges, pisce alb. et lopsters pro
priore, 45s. 8d. In 500 allec. siccis empt. de lardario prioris, 5s. It. in 12 dogdraff empt. de lardario ejusdem, 4s. Month 13, week 1, Pasch. et prior domi (white fish, sand-eels, turbot, salmon, veal, pork, porcell., capriol. et volatil., pullets, cheese, butter, rice, apples; In Mlcvxx ovis per ebdom., 6s. 3d. In the week before Lent were 1080 eggs, but none during Lent). Week 2, Senodus et Justic. per ebdomadam. Weeks 3, 4, Prior domi.

[Empcio Lardar.] In j tauro Wlnerata rec. de Ad. Cowhyrd, 8s. In 5 Cadaveribus de morina cum Coriis rec. de eodem per juramentum, 12s. 11d. Item recepi unum Cadaver in morina de Belsys in morina, apprec. ad vs.
Empcio Multonum. In 130 draughs rec. del Holme et 5 de Pytingdon, 67s. 6d.
Empcio Porcorum. In j porco empt. in villa pro sagimine, 20s. (some are bought at 3s.)
Empcio de dogdraff. In xl Stokfysch rem. post comp. 11s. In 260 dogdrau' et 6 Colfysch. In ccc Skrafysch emp. apud Novum Castrum. In 38 moruc. ccc Stokfysch et Schrafysch, et 60 Colfysch.

Empcio Specierum. In 4 lag. olei olive pro festo Sci. Cuthberti apud Novum Castrum cum barell, 14s. In 2 lag. olei mutuatis de garderoba Prioris ut creditur, 3s. In 10 Laumpronis et 10xx anguill. de eadem garderoba, 24s. secundum estimacionem.

Exp. extra Coquinam. In bordis, scil. Courvers pro plumbis novis in Coquina et pro Le Hek, 20d. In cc clavis pro plumbis coquine, ere, et stanno, et 2 seruris novis, 2s. 2d. In 3 quarteriis calcis pro opere circa dicta plumba in Coquina, 12d. In cariacione lapidum pro illo opere ultra aquam ad gardinum, 18d.; (mason a week and plumber's boy 4 days at same, making and carriage of hay, wick, and making of candles); In pisis emp. pro uno apro per duas vices, 15d. . . . In 14 vasis ligneis empt. pro le fyschors ut creles et lard ut ceteris vasis, 2s. 4d. Item 4or mulieribus cariantibus fymum in orto occidentali per tres dies et 2 mulieribus cariantibus lapides pro mur. per tres dies, 18d. In semine seporino, et semine canab. emp. pro le ympyard, 12d. In 4or vangis ferratis empt., 8d. It. in emendacione sellarum del fyshors, tyr', et Wambtowes, vidz. 2 webbs pro cingulis et plustulis pro le fyschors, et 2 sellis novis factis, 3s. 10d.; It. uni pag' custodienti multon. emp. de Ad. de Ovingham, 7d.; It. cuidam garcioni pro j equo reducendo de Insula sacra, 6d. In j freno novo pro palefrid. vend. emp. de J. de Nesbyt, 14d. In expensis Celerarii, terrarii, et Bursarii in festo Sci. Jacobi apud
Hext., Novum Castrum, et Hertipoll, circa providenciam contra festum Sci. Cuthberti in xla et Sept. ut patet per particulas, 8s. 2d.; In 4 paribus de payngniers novis pro piscator. 8to sportis novis, et 12 ripp's, 2 quart. carb. mar. et duobus turnatoribus auxiliantibus contra festa principalia per annum, 6s. 11d. In streignours et pergam. per annum, 2s. In 2 equis del fyschors rem. post compotum, 33s. 4d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. W. de Hextildesham Sabb. ante S. Joh. P.L., 1338 per 16 septimanas.
DIV2.P: (In this account the names of the butchers and the places from which provisions were obtained are entered in the margin. The former are sometimes mentioned also in the text; also notes of Prior extra, or domi).

Month 1, week 3, In Sandhells empt. pro familia die Veneris, 14d. Week 4, In vij gallinis juvenibus pro priore; in octo aucis juvenibus. Month 2, week 1, In carnibus porc. pro froys, 2d. In lacte emp. pro Charlet, 5d. In 3 pull. gall. pro cena supprioris, 3d. In carnibus mutil. assand. pro cena, 4d. In 2 caponibus pro suppriore, 5d. Week 2, In j summa de Sandells eodem die in villa, 16d. Week 3, In j summa de keling. Week 4, In minutis avibus emp., 3d.; In pisce pro infirmis, 5d. In 10 agnis decimalibus, 2s. 6d.; In spald et brusket' emp., 12d. Month 3, week 1, In j Luc' pro Suppriore, 3d.; week 2, In j summa de Merling', 4s. 4d.; In xl kolfysch, 4s.; In spald et bruskett' per vices, 9d.; week 3, In 4 Curlus die Sancte Marie Magdal., 6d. In 2 Coungres de quodam extraneo, 19d. Month 4, week 3, In quatuor pykerells empt., 9d. Week 4, In Ml allec. rec. et iiijxx cum uno pari corbell empt., 8s. 3d.
Expens. extra Coquinam. In uno pectine novo emp. pro le fyschors, 3d. In 2 equis, videlz le fyschors rem. post ultimum compotum, 44s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1339. W. de Hextildesham. 2 months only.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 2, In 1 porco saginato emp. de quodam et solut. per Hostill. et tall., 13s. 4d. Emp. allec. et pisc. In vxxxij dogdraffes emp. apud Neubigging, prec. pec., 2d. ob. qua.

DIV2.HEAD: s. a. c. 1340. First skin missing. Begins in month 3, week 2.
DIV2.P:
Week 3, Saundres pro colore. Month 4, week 2, Sabb. in lib., 3s. 2¾d. In j summa alb. pisc., ij morur., et j
Schat, cum alio alb. p. emp. apud le Schell et alibi, 31s. 5d. In 1 petra cepi emp. pro frixura, 18d. Week 4, 10 schat. Month 5, week 2, In playces et keltis emp., 6s. In 20 milneles sals., 8s. Week 3, In j spruitt et merling' empt., 21d. Month 6, week 1, In medietate unius cerve empt. in foro, 14d.; In 13 murkokes emp., 2s. 2d. Month 10, week 1, In all. et gastell emp. in villa, 11d.; week 2, In 69 pull. gall., gallin., et iiijor altilibus, 8s. 3½d.; week 4, In . . 3 teles emp. Ends 2nd week after S. Cuthbert (in Sept.), expense of which is 15li. 3s. 10¾d.
Emp. porcor. In 30 baconibus de victualibus d'ni Regis invent. in Lard. de rem. ejusdem (sc. ult. comp.), 60s.
Emp. de Dogdraff. In ciiijxx Dogdraff invent. in Lard. de tempore d'ni W. de victual. D'ni Regis, 40s.
Emp. allec. In vj MD allec. invent. in Lard. de tempore d'ni W. de Schar., 52s.

Emp. specierum. In 20li. succuris alb. emp. de Radulfo de Qwytewell, 20s.; In 12li. succuris Marrok' emp. de R. de Pontefracto, 7s. 6d. In 20li. succuris de Cypir emp. de Adam de Boulton, 11s. 8d.; In 6li. succuris de Cypir emp. in ecclesia, 4s. In 1 pipa olei olive, 4li. In 40 ulnis canab. emp. pro streignours et naperouns, 10s. 10d.
In 2 equis emp. pro piscibus cariandis, 43s. 8d.
It. in 1 alio equo emp., 30s.

In uno pari balancium emp., 10d. In 4or paribus corbell. emp., 16d. In 2 magnis paribus pro pulter, 3s. In 2 sellis pro equis del fischouse et reparacione earundem, 3s. 6d. In reparacione unius muri inter coquinam et refectorium, 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1340. Comp. d'ni R. de Kellaw Celerarii a die Sci. Michaelis Archangeli Anno Domini Millesimo cccmo quadragesimo usque (blank).
DIV2.P: (The accounts of this and following years are on small monthly rolls).

Prima ebdomada primi mensis. Sabbato in libera∣cionibus, 3s. 3d., qa. videlt Domui Dei, ijs.; Anastas., 3½d.; Cupar', 3d. ob.; Molendinar., 3½d., et clericus de Galilea, 4¾d., unde summa ut supra. In 2 duoden. columbell. et volat. emp., 18d. In lacte, allea, et Butir., 18d. Week 3, In 36 aucis emp. quarum xij de Rentges et halpeniges, 5s. 6d. In lacte Butiro et allea, 15d. In 1 quarterona croci et di. li. piperis. Week 4, In 7 kypres emp., 21d.
In 40 auc. quarum 14 Renteges, 5s. 5d. In di. li. zukur emp., 3d. Month 2, week 4, In 6 kypres emp. et 1 salmone salso, 2s. 2d. Month 3, week 1, In 1 ling, 4 kyling, 1 sprut, 3s. 3d. In pulvere zinziberis, maces, pynes, et galanga, 10d. Week 2, pynes et maces; In lacte, pomis, cepis, et allea, 18½d. Week 4, In 30 keling', j leng', j sprout, et 7 kodeling; In . . 5 haddoks emp.

Exp. extra Coquinam. In 4 Robis emp. pro servien∣tibus Celerarii, videlt pro lardinario, Coco conventus, puero del fyschehous, et emptore de Newbigging, 45s. 2 wambetowes; 1 par de creles; j patella de novo facta pro frixur', 2s. Month 4, wanting. Month 5, week 2, In muscles emp., 12d. Week 3, In Braune emp., 20d. In muscles emp., 2s. Week 4, In Salsisteriis et allea empt., 2s. 11d. Month 5, wanting. In 1 celdr. carbon. lingneorum emp. per mensem, 12d.

In 55li. amigd., 28 lb. de Rys. et 52 lb. ficuum et racem. emp., 13s. 2½d. In 1 lb. croci, 1 lb. zinzib., 1 lb. galange, 2 lb. piperis, 8 lb. zukur de Cypre, 1 quarteron de sandr. et aliis speciebus emp. pro festo Sci. Cuthberti, 12s. 7d.
2. Comp. d'ni E. de Karliolo, 134 . .

Month 9, week 1. Sabbato in lib., 2s. 11¼d. Festum Sce. Trinitatis, et Corporis Xi. Exp. extra Coquinam. In iiijor petr. ferri emp. pro clausura cujusdam fenestre in le fyschehous, cum factura, 22d. In j Scomour empt., 2d.; In ferura del fyschehors, 13d.; In j pari corbellorum, 3d. In capistr. cingulis, et Wambtowes, 15s. In j garniamento emp. pro emptore del Schelles, 5s. In expens. Celerarii et secum existencium in nund. de Corbrigge per duos dies, 10s. 3d.
3. Heading gone.
Month 5, week 3. In 41 Dogdr. 37 koles, 40 Stokfysch, et Scrafisches empt., 15s. 8d.

Month (?), week 3. In 8 spalderlyngg' empt. prec. 2¼d., 4s. 6d.

Molendinar. de Prodhowe. Andr. de Couton'. Joh'es Blayk. Alanus de Communa. Joh'es de Smethton'. Robertus de Croxstale. Gilebertus de Molend. Will's Couper. Duo operar. Celerarii. Duo piscator. Celerarii. Syred del Orcheyard).

Camerarii, 5d.; le Waynpain, 2d.; Joh'i Legg, 3d.; Willelmo Cotoun, 3d.; Joh'i Discher, 3d.; Thome Sether, 3d.; 6s. 3¾d. In 1 lb. de Raisins de Curance, 5d. 1366. Twelve monthly rolls, ten of which retain their dates; the other two are with them and are so dated outside in modern figures. These contain at the beginning of each week, In liberacionibus ut supra, 5s. 3¾d., and at the end of each, In recompensac. Coquine, 6s. 5d., 5s. 0½d., 9s. 8½d., 8s. 4d., 18d., 18d., 18d., 18d. One has the entry, In Ginger emp. in villa, 20d. They seem to contain nothing else unusual.

Month 10, week 2, In 34 Renthennes de Shincliff, nil.
Month 11. Nothing special.
Month 12, week 2, Et de 240 Rent Egges, nil. Week 3, In 400 Rent Egges, nil.
Extra. In pore empto, 3s. 4d.
All this year's rolls give the details of the "libera∣ciones."

In 3li. de figis, 6d. In 10li. de almands, 22d. ob.; In 4 multon. rec. emp., 4s. 8d.; In 6 multon. de dragh. rec., 3s. 6d.; In 8 multon. sals., 4s. 8d.; In 12 duodenis columbarum de manerio de Billyngham, 12d.; Servienti Prioris apud Pytyngton, 17d., 15d., 2s. 4½d. In 7li. de suet, 10½d.; In 2 petr. alb. sagiminis, 3s.; In vij aucis indomitis, 2s. 9d.; In 2 cranys, 22d.; In 12 scrafish, 2s.; In 2 multon. drattes, 14d.; In 4 lagen. olei olive, 5s. 4d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1420. Four fragments of Cellarers' monthly rolls. The following are among the entries contained in them.

LIST.ITEM: (a) In 4 murenis, cum diversis speciebus emp. Ebor. per bursarium, 57s. In 27li. Amygdal., 5s. In 5 lagenis olei, 6s. 8d.
(b) Week 2, In Muscull. et Conchis emptis, 2s. 9d. In vijcc Avalan., 7½d. Week 3, In conchis (bis). Week 4, In di. Agktyndell anguill. sals., 2s.
(c) Week 3, In 3 carc. multon. pr. cap. 16d., 4s.
(d) Only one week, and the wages.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1420. A long paper roll for six months and three weeks, consisting of nine pieces of paper neatly sewn together like a parchment roll. Water-mark, a trefoil leaf with two bracts on the stalk. The roll is imperfect at the top, beginning near the end of the second week. The marginal notes are unusually full, but there are very few special entries relating to provisions.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 3, Hic d'ns Prior. Will's Pudsay. Sabb. in liberac., 4s. 10d. Week 4, Hic d'ns Prior cum suis versus Ebor. In 4 carcas 2 tyll bov. sals., 29s. 2d.
Summa primi mensis, 21li. 18s. 10½d.

Month 2, week 1, Hic d'ns Prior, Th. Lumley, M. Joh. Norton, M. Joh. Hinde, M. Joh. Letham, M. W. Newton, Robertus Bellyngham, W. Hauton, cum aliis.
Week 2, Hic d'ns Joh'es Nevell, M. Joh. Ver, Robertus Constabell, Willelmus Chansiller, et collectores d'ni pape per septimanam, et Will's Houton, cum multis aliis. Festum Ascensionis. In j seylle empt., 3s. Week 3, Capitulum generale. Hic d'ns Th. Lumley, Will's Pwddysay, et collectores d'ni pape per septimanam. Week 4, Hic Abbas de Fontauns, M. Joh'es Norton, D'ns Joh. Nevell, Joh. Nevell Junr, Nich. Holme, et Joh. Hedworth, cum multis aliis. In 4 lb. racem. magnorum, 6d. In 1 lb. racem. de curans, 5d.
Summa secundi mensis, 20li. 15s. 6d.

Month 3, week 1, Festum Trinitatis et Festum Corporis Xi. Hic suffraganeus per triduum, M. Joh. Norton, M. Joh. Letham, M. Will's Monkton, M. Will's Newton, Will's Houton, et collectores d'ni pape, cum multis aliis. Week 2, Hic d'ns Prior, M. Joh. Norton bis, M. Joh. Letham, et collectores d'ni pape, cum multis aliis. Week 3, Hic d'ns Prior, M. Joh. Norton, et suffraganeus. Week 4, Hic d'ns Prior, M. Joh. Norton bis, M. Joh. Hethe, cum multis aliis.
Summa tercii mensis, 18l. 18s. 1½d.

Month 4, Week 1, Hic d'ns Episcopus Sarum, Th. Burley (?) ch. p. bren. (?) Week 2, Hic Suffraganeus, W. Puddyssay. Week 3, Hic Th. Lumley, Chr. Matheus de Qwyfeld, Chr. Week 4, Hic Will's Enese (?), Chr. Th. Lumley, Chr. Robertus Enese (?) et W. Puddyssay, cum aliis.
Summa quarti mensis, 21li. 7s. 6d.
Month 5, week 1, Hic Sessio patris. Week 2, Festum Sci. Benedicti. Week 3, M. Joh'es Marchal, cum aliis. Week 4, Festum Sci. Oswaldi. In j Selfysh empt. per Celerarium, 3s. 4d.
Summa quinti mens., 25li. 5s.

Month 6, week 1, Hic Sessio. Festum Assumpcionis Beate Marie. In pedibus boum emptis, 4d. Week 2, Hic Henricus Percy et Joh. Nevell, cum multis aliis. Week 3, (No guests named). Week 4, Festum Sancti Cuthberti et Festum Nativitatis Marie. In pedibus boum emptis, 6d.
Summa sexti mensis, 29li. 11s. 3d.
Month 7, week 1 (No guests named). In 4 carcos. et 1 till boum, 40s. 10d. Week 2, Sessio patris. In prunis empt., 3½d. Week 3, H. Percy Chr. cum aliis.
Summa 3 septimanarum, 19li. 4s. 6½d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1420. A roll in great part illegible (marked 1420).
DIV2.P: Week 4, In vj yslandfyss', 21d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1420. Comp. ejusdem. Feb.—Mar.
DIV2.P: Week 1, Lib. (details), 6s. 4d. Iselandfisch weekly.
Aug.—Sep., week 1, Lib. (details), 5s. 9d. Yslandfiss' weekly.
Sep.—Oct. (cum dupl.), pisc. de Iseland or Yseland weekly.

DIV2.HEAD: 1421. Comp. ejusdem.
DIV2.P: Month 4? Aug.—Sep., week 1, Sabb. in Lib. (details), 6s. 3¼d. Week 2, In j fatte ficuum, 5s. 6d.
Month 8, Dec.—Jan., week 1, Lib., 6s. 3¾d.
Month 10? Feb.—Mar., week 1, Lib. (including Wanpan, 2½d.), 6s. 3¾d. Week 2, In 6 cassis So written, in full. mult., 5s. 10d. In 27 gallinis empt. de vicario de Mydlam, 3s. 11½d.
Month 13, May, week 1, Lib., 6s. 4d. (Waynpain, 2½d). Iceland fish, Beadnell fish, fish from Heselden, etc., continue.

Extra. In j patena empt., 16s. Joh. Netton pro factura vasorum ligninorum, 15s. 10d. Joh. Cowper pro le mote, 6s. In 3 garniamentis pro sezer, fysino, subulco, 15s. 10d. In siliquis emp. pro porcis, 2s. 4d. ob.; pro castracione porcorum, 14d.; pro tonsione ovium, 6s. 0½d.; pro tectura j butres super coquinam, 12s. 4d.; pro ryddyngs boum et vaccarum, 12d. Item peto allocacionem de j bove mortuo, 8s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1421. Comp. ejusdem.
DIV2.P: June 27-July 25. (Three copies). Week 1, Lib., 6s. 3¾d. Nothing special.
There seems to be some confusion in the dates this year.

DIV2.HEAD: 1422. Comp. ejusdem.
DIV2.P: Month 4, week 2. Cuthb. Eps. Comes North.

DIV2.HEAD: 1422. Comp. d'ni Th. Lawson. Fragment of paper roll containing the account for Dec.—Jan.
DIV2.P: Week 1, Sabb. in lib. (no details), 5s. 2½d. Fest. Nativitatis D'ni. In 2 apris et di., 20s. 10d. In 1 porco, 3s. 4d. (42 carc. multon., 5 vitul., 33 porcell., capon., auc., gall., etc.). 52 pestell. porc., 8s. 8d. In 1 Sugyrlaffe, 8s. 4d. Week 2, all erased and re-written, but most of second copy gone. In 8 cuniculis empt., 2s. In 4 Wod∣kokkes empt., 6d. Week 3, Sessio et auditores d'ni episcopi Dunelmensis.

DIV2.HEAD: 1424. Comp. d'ni Joh. Barlay.
DIV2.P: Oct.—Nov. Week 1, Sabbato in lib., viz., hominibus de domo Dei, 2s.; d'no Joh'i Bynchestr', 8d.; Roberto Cok, 7d.; Cursori Scaccarii, 6d.; fabro, 6d.; molendinario, 6d.; clericis Galilee, 5d.; homini Camararie, 2½d.; garcioni ecclesie, 3d.; Waynpayn, 2½d., 5s. 10d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1427. Comp. fr. Thome Warde.
DIV2.P: Jan.—Feb. Nothing special.
June—July. Nothing special.
Sept.—Oct. (Month 7). Week 3, Dies Synodi.

DIV2.HEAD: 1428. A much decayed monthly roll so dated.
1429. Comp. d'ni Th. Lawson. (On paper).
DIV2.P: Month 1. Nothing special. On back.
Month 2. Also a decayed and tattered parchment account of Month 2.
Week 1, In 1 vitulo per Bursar. de Jarow, 3s. Week 2, Fest. Joh. Baptiste et visitatores, viz. Abbas Ebor. cum suis sequelis.
Month 7. Also on paper and on decayed parchment. Nothing special. Another month's account on the other side of the paper.
Two tattered portions of paper rolls with several weeks of Tho. Lawson's accounts for 1429. The following entries occur in them.
Smaller fragment. In Omasis empt., 5s. In Omasis et lacte empt., 7s. 1d.
Larger fragment. 1 Mappa et 1 Towell et 2 Sanappes empt., 5s. 10d.

In 6 quyssyngs empt., 6s. 2d. In 1 Karect. empt. pro cariagio, 2s. 2d. In 2 tribulis et 2 rastris empt., 7½d. In layndmayle solut. sacriste Dunelm., 9½d. Pro illumina∣cione crucibulorum in capitulo, 6d. In 2 Draghrapis et 3 frethyng', 19d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1430. A bundle of eleven rolls, not one of which has a complete head. One has the Cellarer's name "Hesylden," and another "Thomas" (Warde?).
DIV2.P: "Thomas." Week 1, D'ns Joh. Newyll, D'ns Th. Newyll, Magr Will's Doncastr'. In 5 pestels porc. emp., 10d. Week 3, Natale D'ni; iiijxx xviij pestels porc. emp., 16s. 4d.; 3 duoden. Cuniculorum, 4s. 6d.; j Barell separum, 20d. Week 4, Fest. Circumcis. D'ni.

"Hesylden." Week 1, Radulphus Percy, Thomas . . . W. Hoton, Joh. Mydyton (other names lost). In 26 renthenys, nil. Week 2, Vicecomes Heron, D'ns de Furde. Week 3, Ludus prioris apud Beurepare. Joh'es Newell, G. Newell, T. Lumley, W. Enys, M. Joh. Norton, Joh. Lund vicecomes, et aliis. Week 4, Festum Purificacionis Beate Marie Virginis. In 2 carcass 3 quart. et 2 tyld carn. boum, 20s. 5d. In 4 cass. Multon., 5s. 4d. Exp. specierum, etc., including, di. quart. cinamomi, 1¼d.; di. cad. ceparum, 10d.
Headless fragments, including:
In 2 salm. puldr. Comes Northumbrie. Iselandfishs (frequently).

Item in fridys, 6d. Item in cirpis, 6d. Item in castracione porc., 9d. It. in 3 vangis et 1 shovele, 11d. It. in emendacione 1 patene, 6d. It. in j sera empta, 8d. It. Joh. Haliday pro le mote, 6s. 8d. It. pro 8 uln. panni vocat. Herdyng, 2s. It. pro 1 rete emp. cum cord., 9s. It. 1 homini custodienti porc., 18d. It. Joh'i Dale pro souleselver, 9s. Item pro riddyng boum et vacc. del Slaut' (Slaughterhouse?), 12d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1430. Comp. d'ni Tho. Lawson.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 1, Lib. (details), 5s. 2½d. In vj pisc. de Hyesland, 2s. 3d. Week 2, 7 do. (part of roll gone).
Month 2, week 1, pisc. de Hiesland. Robertus M'shall. Week 2, Fest. Sci. Joh'is Bapt. T. Lumbeley, T. Houden, R. Euers, cum multis. . .
Month 3. pisc. de These.
Month 4, week 1, Assumpc. beate Virg. et d'ns Will's Elmeden miles; In 4 laumprayez salsis, 10d. Week 2, Ep'us Karliol. Week 4, In 2 strenyours, ped. boum, et sepis empt., 11d.

Month 5, week 1, Festum Nativ. Be. Marie; In 3 murinulis salsis, 7½d. Week 3, In 2 murinulis salsis, 5d. Week 4, D'ns Ep'us Dunelm.; dies sinodi; Archidiaconus Northumbr. cum multis de Doncastr. et Ebor., etc. In 8 cuniculis et expensis eorundem, 2s. 6d.

Month 6, week 1, D'ns Robertus Umfrayvell, cum multis aliis. Week 2, Prior de Tynemouthe, D'ns Robertus Umfrayvell, d'ns Willelmus Euers, D'ns Willel∣mus Elmeden, Willelmus Lumbeley, cum multis aliis extraneis. Week 4, Fest. Omn. Sanctorum.

Month 7, week 1, In 6 castrimargis empt., 9d. Month 8, week 1, In 12 pluverse, 6 wodcokkes, 1 pertryke, 1 teill, et 18 snypys empt., 2s. 11d. Week 2, Fest. Concept. Beate Marie Virg. et Sessio Justic. d'ni Episcopi in Dunelm. Week 3, In 9 wodcokkis et feldefaris empt., 14½d. Week 4, In . . 1 Turbotsprente. In di. sugerlafe. Festum Natalis D'ni nostri Ihu. Xpi.

Month 9, week 1, Festum Circumcis. D'ni. Et Thomas Worsewyke cum suis. In 19 pestell porc. empt., 3s. 2d. Week 2, Fest. Epiphanie D'ni. Et d'ns Dunelm. Ep'us cum multis magnatibus et aliis extraneis, etc.
Month 10, week 2, Festum Purificacionis beate Marie Virginis.

Month 11, week 1, In Omasis empt., 8s. 9½d. In expensis factis apud Bieurepair, 3s. Week 2, In pisc. empt. viz., 1 salmon recent. 3 lad' muscul., 4s. 9d. Week 4, Festum Deposicionis beati patris Cuthberti.
Month 12. Nothing special.
Month 13, week 3, In 1 Cunger et (blank) regad per Robertum Bayard, 2s. 8d. Week 4, Abbas de Whitby per duos commonachos suos visitavit monasterium Dunelm.

DIV2.HEAD: 1433. Comp. fr. Tho. Ward.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 4, Festum Sci. Nycholai et pietancia d'ni Will'i Poclynton.
Month 4, week 1, D'ns Th. Newyll, D'ns Will. Bowys et Prior de Coldingham. Week 4, Abbas de Novo Monasterio.

DIV2.HEAD: 1434. Comp. ejusdem.
DIV2.P: Month 1, week 1, D'ns Will's Bowes, Rob. Ewers, Will. Hoton, et D'ns Nycholas Holme, cum aliis. Week 4, Festum Sci. Nycholai.
Month 4, week 2, In xdd omasis empt., 2s. 6d. In sawsestyrs empt., 4s. 11d. "In omasis" again, weeks 3, 4.
Month 5, week 3, Deposicio Sci. Cuthberti. In den∣tricibus empt. per burs., 4s. 6d.
Month 6, week 2, Ep's Dunelm. et Sessio. Week 3, Dies Pasche.
Month 9, week 3, Festum Sci. Benedicti.

DIV2.HEAD: 1438-9. Compotus d'norum Thome Warde, Celerarii Dunelm., et Roberti Westmerland, conscii ejusdem, a die Veneris, videlicet a xxiij die mensis Augusti, Anno D'ni Mill'o ccccmo xxxviijo usque ad diem Veneris prox. ante festum Sancti Michaelis, Anno Domini Mill'o ccccmo xxxixno, videlicet per unum annum integrum. (cum dupl.)
DIV2.P: With this roll, which is 8 ft. long by 11 in. broad, begins another series of long rolls for a year, as distinct from the little monthly rolls, which begin c. 1340, p. 36. Some time between 1333-4 and 1438-9 an arrangement appears to have been made by which the Cellarer received and accounted for the rents, etc., of a number of different places instead of lump sums from the Bursar, as shown above, p. 1, etc. These long rolls cannot be given in extenso, but the following abstract may give some idea of their contents).
Reman. De reman. nil, quia hic primo computat.

Arreragia. Sed respondet de 18li. 13s. 0½d. de arr. diversorum annorum d'ni Joh'is Durham, quondam Bursarii Dunelm.; 37li. 4s. 11d. de arr. duorum ann. d'ni Will'i Pertryk, quondam Burs. Dunelm.; 69li. 11s. 4d. de arr. trium annor. d'ni Joh. Oll nuper Burs. Dunelm.; 17li. 4s. 4d. de arr. tam d'ni Joh. Oll quam d'ni Thome Lawson de anno D'ni Mill'o ccccmoxxxijdo. Ciiijxxxvijli. xjs. vijd. de arr. v annorum et di. finiencium in festo Pent. Anno D'ni Mlccccmoxxxviijo de tempore dicti d'ni Thome ultimi Bursarii Dunelm.
Summa, 340li. 5s. 2½d.

Norhamshire et Elandshire. Et de 53li. 15d. de firma ville de Shoresworth, necnon de aliis reddit. piscar., decimis majoribus et minoribus, et proficuis currentibus in onere procuratoris ecclesie ibidem, ultra 20li. solut. eidem procu∣ratori pro pens. sue vicarie. Et ultra 26s. 8d. sol. eidem pro feodo suo. Et ultra 106s. 8d. pro salario unius capellani apud Cornhill, et ultra 2s. solutos clerico scribenti compotum ejusd. procuratoris.
Summa, 53li. 15d.
Harbotill. 8s. de d'no Rob. Umfravill pro redd. ass. quinquies xxti acr. terr. juxta Harbotil, ut patet per cartas Walteri de Insula et Reginaldi de Insula.
Summa, 8s.
Elyngeham. 30s. pro terr. et ten. pertin. ad glebam Rectoris ibidem.
Summa, 30s.

Werkworth. 26s. 8d. de Com. Northumbr. pro firma capelle Beate Mar. Magd. et pro 120 acr. terr. arab. et pro prato quod vocatur Braynley infra parcum de Aklyngton ut patet per cartam Joh. fil. Roberti.
Summa, 26s. 8d.
Cramlyngton. 6s. 8d. de her. Alex. Kyblesworth pro lib. red. trium toft. et 1 car. terre et 1 tofto et 30 acr. terr. cum 1 piscaria in aqua Tyne.
Summa, 6s. 8d.

Walleshend. 13li. 15s. 4½d. de Collectore ib'm pro firmis et redd. terrarum et pratorum dominicalium una cum Redd. ass. ejusd. ville; 8d. pro 7 bondis; 7½d. pro mesyngpenys; 24s. pro 7 bondis antedictis in precio 7 quar. de Scatmaltez sic sibi vend. hoc anno; 20s. pro herbag. bosci ib'm; nil de Rawyar et Walyar quia dimittuntur in gross. cum manerio, tamen redd. sol. per ann., 8s.; 24s. de Smethyar et Holmesyar dimiss. Tho. Mody.
Summa, 17li. 4s. 8d.

Wyllyngton. 13li. 6s. 8d. ob. rec. de Collectore ib'm pro redd. ass. ejusd. ville una cum operibus debitis manerio de Walleshend. Et nil r. hic de molendino ventritico quia vastum, tamen sol. r. p. ann., 26s. 8d.
Summa, 13li. 6s. 8½d.
Novum Castrum. Nil resp. hic de 9li. 3s. 4d. pro pens. concessa per Regem pro firma ville N. C., quia assignantur Magistro de Farne.
Summa, nulla.
Pypwelgate. 116s. 10d. de redd. ass. de P. et Gateshed.
Summa, 116s. 10d.

Overheworth. 14li. 14s. 8d. pro redd. ass. ville de O. H. cum 16d. pro Renthennys ejusd. ville. Et de 26s. pro luto in campo ejusdem. Et nil de mesyngpenez ad fest. S. Martini, quia dimittuntur in gross. cum tota villa.
Summa, 16li. 8d.

Nethirheworth. 4li. 6s. 8d. de Roberto Forster pro firm. et redd. terr. et prator. dominicalium in N.H. cum feno decimali eorund. Et de 71s. 8d. de Collectore ib'm pro redd. ass. Et de 31s. de eodem pro operibus debit. manerio de Wardley. Nil de ij molendinis quia vasta. Et nil de duobus quareris subtus le hanyng, quia extra tenur., tamen redd. sol., 20s. Et nil resp. hic de 1 quarera in mora vocata Welhedis quia extra tenur. tamen r. sol., 10s. Sed resp. de 13s. 4d. pro j piscar. in aqua de Tyne vocata le Hemmyngyar. 12d. pro mesyngpenez. 6s. 8d. pro firma j piscar. vocat. Blaklawyar.
Summa, 10li. 10s. 4d.
Fellyng. 20s. 8d. pro lib. redd. de Fellyng. Nil de j piscar. in aqua de Tyne voc. Bondyar pertin. ad Scaccarium d'ni Prioris, quia extra tenuram.
Summa, 26s. 8d.
Folanceby. 10s. pro lib. redd. ville de F.
Summa, 10s.

Hebarn. 48s. 4d. pro lib. redd. terr. et ten. ib'm. 12s. pro lib. redd. duarum partium piscar. in Tyne. 20s. pro 1 mes. et 68 acr. terre. 46s. 8d. pro firma unius clausure voc. Westryddyng. 20d. pro f. 1 piscar. in Tyne voc. Pethyar.
Summa, 6li. 8s. 8d.
Monkton. 40s. pro redd. ass. ville de M. 6li. pro firma 8 bondag. ib'm. 2s. 2d. pro lib. redd. terrarum communiarum.
Summa, 8li. 2s. 2d.
Hedworth. 6li. 13s. 4d. de coll. ib'm pro redd. ass. ville de H. 6d. pro 1 pastura. 6s. 1d. pro lib. redd. terr. et ten. cum 8d. pro di. lb. piperis et vd. pro 1 lb. cimini.
Summa, 6li. 19s. 11d.
Symondsett. 12li. 13s. 4d. pro redd. ass. ville de S. cum tercia parte ejusd. ville capt. ad firmam per d'nm de Rad'o Bullmer. 13s. 4d. rec. de eodem pro lib. redd. dicte tercie partis.
Summa, 13li. 6s. 8d.

Jarow. 40s. de magistro ib'm pro redd. ass. ejusd. ville. 40s. pro Courtyar et Fullyar tamen sine dimiss. pertinent. ad scacc'm Prioris Dunelm. 6s. 8d. pro firma 1 piscarie pert. ad dictum scacc'm vocat. Fleyar. 16d. de oblacionibus de Jarow in festo apostolorum Petri et Pauli officio Burs. spectant. ex consuetudine.
Summa, 4li. 8s.
Harton. 27li. 7s. 1d. de Collectore ib'm pro r. ass. et pro 21 bond. ejusd. ville. Et de 53s. 4d. pro lez Deynez ib'm, nil, quia assignantur burs.
Summa, 27li. 7s. 1d.

Wyuestow. 14li. 4s. 10½d. de Collectore ib'm pro redd. ass. ejusd. ville. 16s. pro lib. redd. terr. ib'm. 9s. 4d. pro lib. redd. terrar. ib'm. 3s. 4d. pro firma 1 piscarie in Tyne vocat. le Ebyar. 10li. pro firma molendini de Shelez.
Summa, 25li. 13s. 6½d.
Southwike. 15li. 9s. pro firma ville de S. cum f. molendini et f. piscarie ib'm. 43s. 11d. pro lib. f. diversor. terr. et ten ib'm.
Summa, 17li. 12s. 11d.
Shelez. 18li. 12s. 4d. de redd. ass. ville de S. Et de 10s. rec. de eadem villa pro firma brasinag. ejusd. ville que reddere solebat per annum, 40s. Et de 4s. pro tractu de Sandhelis hoc anno.
Summa, 19li. 6s. 4d.

Fullwell. 6li. 6s. 8d. pro manerio ib'm cum decimis garb. et feni eidem manerio pertin. in precio 19 quar. frumenti ad 6s. 8d. 6li. 6s. 8d. pro eodem manerio cum dec. garb. et feni eidem man. pertin. Et de 9li. 8d. de Collectore ib'm pro redd. ass. ejusd. ville.
Summa, 21li. 14s.

Wermouth. 12li. 3s. 4d. de Collectore ib'm pro redd. ass. ejusd. ville. 16s. 2d. pro lib. redd. terr. et ten. ib'm, preter alia opera et servicia debita manerio de Fullwell et Celerario Dunelm. 14½d. de oblac. fact. ib'm ad summum altare ad festum Apostolorum Petri et Pauli ex consuetudine.
Summa, 13li. 19½d.
Hawthorn. 4s. pro lib. redd. j carucat. terre.
Summa, 4s.
Sylkesworth. 13s. 4d. de 4 tenementis ib'm pro lib. redd. ejusd. ville.
Summa, 12s. 4d.

Hertilpole. 20s. pro firma 2 mes. et 1 magne domus alleciarie cum suis pertinentiis in simul jacentibus super le Northraw in Southstrete dimis. ad term. xc annorum. 2s. 4d. pro firma j burg. super Southraw in Southgate dim. ad term. lxxx annorum. 3s. pro lib. redd. j burg. super Southraw in Southgate per annum. 10s. 8d. pro lib. redd. j domus et j bothe apud Neshend super le Southraw p.a. 12d. pro libero redditu j burg. prope ten. pred. apud le Neshend. 5s. pro l. r. j burg. in Northgate super Westraw et 2 burg. vast. jacentibus super Southraw in Southgate nil, quia totaliter vasta.
Summa, 43s.
Coupon. 7li. 3s. 4d. de 16 ten. ibidem pro tot salinis in prec. 35 quar. 6 bus. 2 pc salis, 8 bus. ad j quar., prec. quar. 4s.
Summa, 7li. 3s. 4d.
Brome. 8s. pro redd. ass. j toft et 8 acr. terr. ib'm. 5s. 4d. pro redd. ass. j toft et j acr. terre ib'm. Nil de puteo carbonum ib'm, quia non occupatur.
Summa, 13s. 4d.

Cokyn et Fordhous. 2s. de Priore de Fynkall pro lib. redd. divers. terrar. et ten. in villa de Cokyn per annum ut patet per novum feodarium. Et de 2d. rec. de eodem Priore pro libero redditu j gardini juxta vadum de Fynkall vocat. Fordhous, ut patet per dict. feodarium.
Summa, 2s. 2d.
Ludworth. 26s. 8d. pro lib. redd. j toft. vasti ad finem orientalem ville super Northraw et 45 acr. terre in campo ejusdem ville.
Summa, 26s. 8d.
Aldyngrige cum Beurepayremore. 6li. de manerio de Aldyngrige, Almonerhalgh, magna clausura juxta le Stot∣yate, cum mora de Beurepayre.
Summa, 6li.

Vetus Burgus. 26s. 8d. pro redd. ass. 2 acr. terre in mora de Beurepayr juxta pontem de Aldyngrige, et 1 clausura continen. 5 acr. terre super Wharflatt et aqua de Brome et j clausura continente 10 acr. terre juxta claus. Elemos. et aquam de Brome et j clausura continente 3 acr. terre super Redehill juxta Codesley et 3 acr. terre in Codesley juxta Chiltonpole in duobus locis. 2s. rec. de Sacrista Dunelm. pro j gardino super Westraw in South∣strete. 20s. rec. de granatario et Joh'e Watkynson pro redd. ass. j claus. super stagnum molendini, et j claus.
vocat. quarer. celerar., et j claus. vocat. Ferthyngcroft. Et pro tribus acr. in campo de Belacise vocat. Gosecroft. 3d. rec. pro lib. redd. j ten. ex parte boriali torrentis de Milburn. 2s. pro lib. redd. j ten. ex parte australi ejusd. ten. ib'm. 21d. pro domo quondam Roberti Littster ib'm. 12d. pro domo ib'm. 24s. pro. firma 4 ten. in Veteri Burgo Dunelm.
Summa, 3li. 17s. 8d.

Elvett. 119s. 4d. de redd. divers. ten. et communis furni ib'm. 14s. 8d. pro lib. redd. trium ten. 3s. 4d. pro tercia parte unius ten. 12li. pro molendino de Skaltok. 6s. 8d. de lib. firma noviter adquisita de Thoma Holden exeunte de 1 ten. ib'm in tenura hostilarii Dunelm.
Summa, 19li. 4s.

Pensiones. 20s. de Abbate Novi Monasterii pro pens. ecclesie Whelpyngton; 10s. de Priore de Hexham pro pens. eccl. de Ovyngeham; 3s. 4d. de eodem Priore pro pens. eccl. de Aldeston; 6s. 8d. de Priore de Tynemouth pro pens. eccl. de Hawtwysill.
Summa, 40s.
Vendicio lane. 65s. 3d. de 27 petr. lane albe prec. singule petre, 2s. 5d.
Summa, 65s. 3d.
Vendicio coriorum. 22li. 17s. 3½d. de Coriis boum, vaccar. et vitulor., pellibus lanutis et pell. nudis provenien∣tibus de lardaria d'ni Prioris et lard. Hospicii hoc anno.
Summa, 22li. 17s. 3½d.
Barkhous. 8li. 13s. 4d. de Joh. Henryson firmario de le Barkhous, et cujusdam parcelle de le Celerar Orcheard.
Summa, 8li. 13s. 4d.
Vendic. cebi et feodi et alior. proficuor. coquine. 7li. 13s. 4d. pro 152 petr. cebi venditi ad 10d. 105s. 9d. in precio 121 petr. feodi coquine ad 9d. 73s. 4d. de exitibus animalium et piscium.
Summa, 16li. 12s. 5d.
Ravensflatt et Westyrton. 26s. 8d. de ij (secunda) vestura de Ravensflatt et Westyrton.
Summa, 26s. 8d.
Gardinum celerarii. 26s. 8d. de gardino celerarii.
Summa, 26s. 8d.
Rylley. Nil de firma de Rylley celerarii, quia assignatur eidem pro butiro et caseo.
Summa, nulla.
Perquisit. finium et amerciamentorum. 28s. 6d. pro finibus et amerciamentis trium Turnorum halmot. infra tempus compoti.
Summa, 28s. 6d.
Recepcio forinc. 8d. de Ancaragio duarum navium apud Shelez. 6li. 8s. 6d. rec. de relicta Ricardi Couhird pro reparacione manerii de Aldyngrige.
Summa, 6li. 9s. 2d.

Decima garb. paroch. de Jarow. 6li. de Wyllyngton et Walleshend sic vendit. (purchasers' names mentioned in each case). 23s. 4d. de Nethirheworth; 33s. 4d. de Hebarn; 20s. de Monkton; 46s. 8d. de Symondsett; 8li. 13s. 4d. de Harton; 4li. 3s. 4d. de Wystow; 10s. de Fellyng; 10s. de Folanceby.
Summa, 26li.
Decima garb. paroch. de Wermouth. 6li. de South∣wyk; 36s. 4d. de Hilton.
Summa, 7li. 16s. 4d.
Preter Arr., 424li. 12s. 6d.
Cum Arr., 764li. 17s. 8½d.
Empcio boum et vaccarum. In primis in 20 Stottez emp. de Roberto Strangwas, prec. cap. 9s., 9li. (Etc.; 29 lines on the roll).
Summa, 114li. 16s. 2d.
Empcio ovium. In primis in 4xx multon. emp. de Willelmo Gilson, prec. cap. 21d., 7li. (Etc.; 12 lines, including 10 hoggastrez).
Summa, 58li. 12d.
Empcio agnorum. In primis in 4xx agnis emp. de Willelmo Hakforth de Hoghall, prec. cap. 10d., 65s. 8d. (Etc.; 2 lines).
Summa, 6li. 8s. 4d.
Empcio porcorum. In primis in 1 porco emp. de Willelmo Dyghton, 20d. (Etc.; 9 lines).
Summa, 7li. 11s. 5d.

Empcio cuniculorum, porcellorum, caponum, gall. et aucarum. In primis in 2 dd. cuniculorum prec. cap. 4d., 8s. It. in 40 aucis emp., de decima de Esyngton, 10s. 3d. 9 auc. emp. de dec. de Pytyngton, 2s. 3d. 13 auc. emp. de dec. de Byllyngham, 3s. 4d. 55 gallin. emp. de dec. de Esyngton, 6s. 10½d. 6 gallin. emp. de dec. de Pytyngton, 12d. 13 gallin. emp. de dec. de Hoghton, 2s. 2d. 41
gallin. emp. de dec. de Byllyngham, 7s. 9d. 3 porcell. emp., 12d.; 40 gallin. emp. de dec. de Norton, 6s. 8d.; 3 capon. emp., 9d.; 6 capon. emp., 18d.
Summa, 51s. 5½d.

Empcio olei, mellis, butiri, et sagiminis. In primis in 6 lagen. et di. mellis emp. de Roberto Hull de Langchester, 6s. 6d. It. in 2 de Tho. Shele de Stelley, 22d.; 2 de Rob. Hall, 22d.; 5 de Joh. Alnewyk de Walrige, 5s.; 9 de Will. Alman de Neuton, prec. lag. 11d., 8s. 3d.; 11 de Will. Emotson de Neuton, pr. lag. 11d., 10s. 1d. It. in 3 lagenis olei emp. de Thoma Castell de Novo Castro, 46s. 8d. It. in 5 petr. butiri emp. per Thomam de Hall, pr. petr. 16d., 6s. 8d.; 5 petr. emp. in villa per catorem, 6s. 5d.; 1 petr. emp. in villa per Ric. Warcopp, 15d.; 17 petr. et di. albi sagiminis emp. de Will. Archer, pr. petr. 18d., 26s. 2d. ob. 4 petr. alb. sag. emp. de Joh'e Fleschewer de Veteri Burgo, prec. petr. 18d., 6s.
Summa, 7li. 12s. 8½d.

Empc. piscium. In primis in vml allec. soris emp. de Will's Bromptoft de Hertilpole ad 8s., 40s. It. in 1 last allec. s. emp. de eodem ad 10s. 6d., 105s.; 6ml all. s. de eodem ad 6s. 8d., 40s.; 4ml ad 7s., 28s.; 2ml de Gaufrido Mawer, 20s.; 7ml de relicta Rob. Bone de Hertilpole ad 10s., 70s. It. in 1 barell allec. alb. emp. de Gaufrido Mawer, 9s.; 9 barell de Joh. Anbell de Novo Castro ad 9s. 9d., 4li. 7s. 9d. It. in 140 dogdravez emp. de Joh. Robynson et Gaufrido Mawer, pr. cap. 6d., 4li. In 105xx dogdravez emp. de Joh'e Whitheuyd de eadem villa, pr. cap. 5½d., 105s. 10d.; 63 emp. de Patricio Saundyrson de Hertilpole, pr. cap. 7½d., 37s. 6d.; 162 emp. de Gaufrido Mawer, pr. ca. 3¼d., 63s.; 20 emp. de Joh. Geryng, 6s. 8d.; 22 de Thoma Short de eadem, pr. cap. 7d., 12s. 6d.; in 4xx de Ric'o Forde de eadem, pr. ca. 8d., 53s. 4d.; in 200 de Ric'o Bromptoft de eadem, pr. ca. 8d., 8li.; 10 de Gauf. Mawer pr. ca. 6d., 5s. It. in 100 Stokfish emp. per Joh'em Barker de Novo Castro, pr. ca. 2d., 20s. In 5 dd. 8 salmon. sals. emp. de d'no Joh'e Har, 16s.; 17 dd. de eodem, pr. dd. 3s., 51s.; 13 dd. 6 salmon emp. per d'nm Joh'em Byrtley, 59s. 6d.
